address: Arakere Gate, Next to HSBC, Opposite Reliance Mart, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Hyderabad Biryaani House
dish_liked: Hyderabadi Biryani, Chicken Biryani, Raita, Mutton Biryani, Vegetable Biryani, Butter Chicken, Basmati Rice
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Have been there and ordered home delivery and have picked up myself...love the Mutton biryani and kebabs they prepare. Be prepared to wait on weekends due huge rush..'), ('Rated 3.5', "RATED
  Have tried this place..koramangala outlet and the bannergatta one...so we cannot expect anything fancy or nice...but the biriyanis are nice here...spicy ones...service is okay...They take 20 min o more...place was kinda full...All regular seatings...
It's in 1st floor...The stairs we gotta climb is sad (bad maintenence)
This rating is only for the food served. ?"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This Place never fails to amuse me with its taste!!! One of the best biryani adda?
I ordered the family pack biryani combo and chicken kebabs, both were out of the world!!!
Keep up the good work team?'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Not a good experience I would say having tried this place many times I would say it's always a mixed experience. Sometimes it's impressive then it become dull next time. The place unexpectedly changes taste used to serve spicy biryanis earlier now it's standard has got down does not have that kind of biryani. With so many biryani restaurants competing in this area, this place sure dilutes down compare to nagarjuna and nandhana which have remained constantly great in terms of food and service. They need to make changes soon or else it would become an only delivery outlet.")]

address: 13, Opposite Auchan Hyper Market, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Chicken County Grand
dish_liked: Chicken Grill, Fish, Shawarma, Rolls, Tandoori Chicken, Hyderabadi Chicken, Chicken Roll
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  It is a basic restaurant & offers value for money . Nothing special about the taste & ok service . Landed here since wanted to try out some new place in my neighbourhood.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  I wanted to give it a try, since it looked quite attracting from outside and I was equally disappointed with the food, as they lack the savour and chicken in the gravy was not even cooked well..'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Amazing place good foooddd my first preference if i am on bannerghatta road for sime work will never miss lunch here there biryani gravys and grilled chicken i amazing and every alternative day i buy grilled chicken to home so addicted food 5******'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Head over to Chicken County for their Grilled Chicken. It's absolutely fantabulous (ideal blend of fantastic and fabulous) and a must try if you happen to visit. Their chicken biryani is great too."), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  Food was ok, but service was terrible. Waiters don't care about guests at all, they can't even give two menu cards at same table, it was like Guest will take it with them. Never seen such ridiculous hospitality. Very disappointed")]

address: 10, Ground Floor, 24th Main, Ayodhya Nagar, 5th Phase, JP Nagar, Bangalore
name: Roll Over
dish_liked: Rolls, Ice Cream Roll, Fries, Chocolate Icecreams, Banana Nutella, Chocolate Ball, Waffles
cuisines: Desserts, Ice Cream, Beverages, Fast Food, Sandwich
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I knew this was going to be a good experience right off the bat - for the care that went into packing the food for a delivery order was clearly visible. It was proper! There was zero spillage, as it happens with most dessert orders. I ordered for an English Tosca Sundae, the quantity was generous and so was it for the chocolate sauce which came in a separate jar. I never really ran out of the sauce, and had enough to continue pouring onto the never ending bowl of sundae!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One of the finest place to have Ice Cream ?

They have very good varieties of ice cream, milk shake, pastries and service is very good?

Ambience is very pleasant to chill with friends ??

They have live counter and pleasure to see how they prepare the ice Cream roll?

I just loved the roll over ice cream and it was so delicious and yummy..

I took devil chocolate chip it was well garnished and looking so cute?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  They have a great selection of ice creams and sundaes. They have fries available with a variety of dips.
I tried the irish coffee love from the gourmet plates section which came with irish coffee rolls, tiramisu cake and a cup of chocolate which was thick and rich,though the cake could use a little more flavour the ice cream was good.
The place is very clean and perfect for family visits and hangouts.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Nice presentation by some skilled people. I guess we tried smoor sundae and devils chocolate... One had a huge jelly piece while the other had low quality chocolate sauce and ice cream. Menu was missing kid friendly and non dry fruit and fresh fruit ice cream options. Desserts quality was slightly low when compared with the lights of cream Stone or corner house or stoner. Can do better!'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  They have a nice setup on jp nagar to puttenhalli road..
Took a caramel chocolate based Sunday and a paan flavor roll!!
Ambience is nice and the paan ice cream was nice and had real sweet supari which gave a nice fresh flavour.
The ice cream sundae was okok'), ('Rated 3.5', 'RATED
  Good place for ice creams. Ambience is good for an once cream parlour. Self-service so nothing much to comment here. Satiating and filling. Their wall decor is cool.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Decent, good service, ambience was good....reasonably priced. Would have given a 5 rating had it not been for a fact that the cook was using hands without gloves to scoop ice creams from the box and his index finger was all over the ice cream.

Chocolate karma is not worth taking. Butterscotch sundae was excellent.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Wanna experiment with ice cream!! Then just roll overrrrr.
Been here on a late Sunday evening and it's all worth visiting this place.
The place is small but has good seating to chill out with your loved ones.
We ordered mango roll, french fries and chocolate karma.
French fries is to its perfecto and so as chocolate karma

Ambience: 3.5*
Food : 4.5*
Value for money : 4*
Service : 4*

Parking : No, could be be a problem for 4 wheelers.

Will I visit again : a definite yes")]

address: 10, Near Maruti Sagar Automobiles, Bhavani Layout, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Savoury - Sea Shell Restaurant
dish_liked: Shawarma, Biryani, Chicken Grill, Rolls, Tomato Soup, Haleem, Sea Food
cuisines: Arabian, North Indian, Chinese, Seafood, Biryani, Rolls, Beverages
reviews_list:
[('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  my review 11th january 2019.
it?s awesome eve @ bangalore. decided to have a visit at lalbaag. but kids were hungry so orderedchicken myonaise sandwich and avocado juice through ubereats at savoury..delivery time expected was 3:40pm but delivered at 4:10\U0001f975?.. Alas what delivered was chicken manchows soup??? and avocado juice.avocado was tasty and thick one.one of the best avocado i ever had.but how kids accept soup instead of sandwich.it was not at all ok for kids... decided to reorder and called at restaurant (08049994999 number) ... too desperate reply from savoury which i never expected... the one who attended the cal just cut the fon by saying contact uber eats..mistake was surely from restaurant side.. However uber refunded amount for us.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Pathetic Grilled chicken as it has only bones and no chicken. Adding to that the staff behaviour was so bad. We saw the chicken and had one piece to realize it was just bomes and we returned it and obviously who will agree to pay for masala and bones?

So yes post that never ever been there.

Empire Restaurant which is opposite to it is a must visit for chicken.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Had heard about this restaurant that it's famous for Arabic food. Ordered Pepper chicken BBQ. The taste was very good. Next tasted Mutton Biryani. It was normal in taste. The ambience is simple and regular. Friendly staff.

Follow @explorewithketan1 on Instagram to explore more eateries ?"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good collection of platters here! They had platters that could serve a big table!
We ordered Naans, butter chicken, dal tadka and rice.
Chicken biryani here was also great!
Parking can be a bit difficult in this narrow road during peak hours'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  What a place... Yammy yammyy..love the sawarma from here..it as so yummy n i m love of with sawarma.. Ambience is good..though cudnt taste more cuisins..only had sawarma but it was rocking..'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A very good restaurant in neighborhood. Had been here for a quite bite. Ambience is good. They have many options in there menu. Indian, Chinese, Fast foods, juice, shakes and many more.

Ordered tandoori roti, kadhai veg, dragon chicken and kesar pista milkshake. Everything was damn tasty.

Staffs were courteous and service was very fast.

Pocket friendly place with tasty food. A must try place!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This is place is like a paradise for non vegetarians. We often go there for grill chicken and chicken shawarma roll. They roast the chicken very nicely that?s why the meat inside is very tender and juicy. Bbq chicken was so good- it?s a bit spicier than grill chicken.  They have also huge varieties in Chinese food. I have only tried their egg chicken noodle which was very good in taste and quantity was sufficient for two people. But the only con is- their service. The staffs are not prompt, very unorganized and slow service. But for their food quality and price it can be definitely tried.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I was in a spree to try all those food available in Bangalore.So this we got it from Uber eats and its Mutton Biriyani.Packing was pretty good and looks like a too spicey biriyani.

Started without much delay and finally understood its not that much spicey.Taste was just normal and i couldn't find any difference .

Quantity was enough for a persok and the mutton pieces we got is good and tender .Few bone pieces alone we foundout from this.But anyway this was good for a lunch and am ok with the food.

Packing:4/5
Taste:3/5
VFM:3/5"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have had dinner from here many times especially late night snacks as they were one of the few places at the time to be open till 1 AM. They always satisfy me with their quality dishes and I have never been disappointed with them ever.

Now coming to food part, I have tried Dragon chicken and Spicy chicken Shawarma for starters and both were good. For main we had Biriyani but it was just average. We also had Butter naan along with Butter chicken and they were good dishes.

Overall its one of the best options when it comes to late night dining and I recommend it to all.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The best place for Arabic dishes !! Their shawarma and grill chicken are too good! The garlic paste used as sauce for both the dishes one as a filling and the other as a dip are just too good! Ample parking space too in the midst of a busy road!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  After starving for 3 days and living of coffees - missing home made food :( , a colleague suggested this place. This place was a blessing in disguise. In Bangalore I really had a bad experience for veg food and the only meal I could eat was hear at this place after 3 days. I don't really remember what my colleagues ordered for me about whatever they ordered was yummy and good quality. The food smell was more than enough to say it will be tasty too."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Great Arabian cuisine at reasonable prices . Very tasty sizzlers . Good prawn and chicken dishes . Good service and ambience . A nice place to spend good time and have good food .'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Discount the terrible mood of the waiters at times, this place is awesome. Have been there multiple times and tried quite a few items. Almost all are good. Mutton Mandi is delicious but not for the faint hearted. May not suit everyone?s taste or liking, however i simple relish it everytime. Special shawarma plate is nice. Shakes are also good. Amongst several branches the one on mosque road and this one on bannerghata road stand out. One on Sarjapur road is disaster.')]

address: 161 A, First Floor, Vinayaka Nagar, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Firangi Bake
dish_liked: Lasagne
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Had ordered the Bombay masala quesidilla and the veg Mac and cheese. The quesidilla was stuffed generously and cooked to perfection. Veg Mac and cheese came with a good amount of cheese. A great dish for little ones as well.

The food was delivered hot and the quantity was good owing to the price.'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Only delivery but no live Tracking . Not yet delivered .
Not knowing proper locations. Or not asking locations properly or picking location from Zomato.
Very bad experience.
Delivery guys number mostly switch-off
Not refunding the amount back also. Give coupon to order later. The one who can't deliver now , how he will deliver later.
If u r doing delivery make sure delivery buys are not drunk"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Firangi Bake, a huge delivery outlet chain delivers one of the best and cheesiest lasagne in town, it's highly recommended.

Their delivery is super prompt and food is absolutely drooling.

Along with lasagne there was mac and cheese which was okayish, couldn've been better.

To conclude, it was a good experience. Recommended."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  There are a few places who know what lasagne is and firangi bake is one of them. We tried both the versions, the veg as well as the non-veg version of lasagne. The food came in quick and was neatly and nicely packed and even the aroma itself was enough to make us drool all over. The veg version had a layer of baked mozzarella cheese with crumbled cottage cheese, corns and veggies nicely tucked in between the lasagne sheets. They dish was baked to perfection and the presence of oregano, salt and pepper made all the difference. The non-veg version was no less than the veg one where minced chicken carrying a tantalizing taste was stuffed below the baked layer of mozzarella along with veggies. Though we are die hard non-veg lovers but in this case we found the veg one to be a notch higher than the later one.

All in all, we loved the dish and we soon will be trying the other dishes offered by the outlet soon'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Who has ever said no to cheese!? The food I had from Firangi Bake was rich, cheesy and delicious!

? Tandoori Kukkad Rice Pot: Beautifully cooked rice with chunky and soft pieces of chicken. Amazing.

? Veggie Pot Rice: Absolutely filling and satisfying. Good choice for vegetarians!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I had ordered for a Tandoori Kukkad Pot Rice (Non Veg) and a Minced Chicken Lasagna (Non Veg).
I was surprised to see that both the dishes seemed very similar with the presentation. The Lasagna was very good with good amount of cheese. The Pot Rice was not as i expected it to be, as rice wouldn't go well with Cheese."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Ordered Bombay masala quesadilla and chocolate decadence cake from here. Delivery was on time and prompt. Both the orders were delicious. Quesadilla was very tasty. It was something like a baked Pac bhaji kind of taste. Very well executed experimental dish. The cake was soft and chocolatey. It was heavenly. Best part was the careful packing done for the cakes! It was nearly packed so that it doesn't loose it's shape and the frosting. All you, chocolate lovers .. this is a must try here. Will definitely order more frequently from firangi bake! Totally loved it."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Loved the lasgane here.. was very creamy and full of flavours.. Can give it a try..
It's a new conceptual place. Looking forward to try more stuff from this place.")]

address: 176, 1st Floor, Above Vodafone Store, Opposite Brand Factory, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Kundana
dish_liked: Lemon Chicken, Chicken Dum Biryani, Mutton Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Decent biryani with 2 pieces kabab, gravy and salad. There was no sweet in the delivered pack though the description of combo included a sweet as well.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  kundana...... we went for a movie to vegacity and was searching for a typical andhra lunch and could found kundans board appearing nearby and finally we went there and ordered thali which was really Yum ? mostly the best was authentic mango and tomato pickle which was too good and was giving best company to the thalis a must visit place to have the authentic feel of Andhra.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I was not sure about this resturant, never heard of it. Thought to give it a try so ordered Chicken Dum Biryani.

It was surprisingly good, one of the best biryani. It was really yummy and the chicken was well cooked. Quantity of biryani rice was just right. It's a must try place for biryani lovers."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  First point I have impressed with this restaurant is they have paid enough attention for spl instructions which we mention at the time of placing order... am not sure abt this can happen in everybody case but its happen with me.... Coming to taste its quite good and andhra reason people can enjoy thoroughly am talking abt veg dishes related only.... NON-VEG is out-of-box 2 me... if any one reach near Vega city and that time if u feel u r starving then go and dig in...'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The name shows it is a Andhra Cuisine Restaurant.
They are Andhra + Chinese + North Indian cuisine.
They serve one of the best Andhra Meals.
I havw tried their Biryani. Very nice biryani and much better than Meghana. The spices are different than regular biryani spicea.
They serve Rambo Biryani which is the best biryani i ever had.
They also serve Guntoor Chicken which was also very nice.
They also serve some Chinese dishesh which are really good.
I am their regular customer.
This place is definitely recommended for Andhra people. Much better option price wise than Nagarjuna and other restaurants.
Very good food without a big hole to pocket.
Overall everything is good here even the ambience.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  This sunday was movie night and post movie we had dinner in Kundana. The restaurant was almost empty, we were welcomed with courtesy. Service was good and we ordered Paneer tikka, Mutton biryani, tandoori roti and lime soda. We were served complimentary papad and salad. Paneer tikka was tasty and green chutney was awesome. Mutton biryani was delicious and it had good pieces of mutton and rice quantity was enough for one person. Roti was hard and little difficult to eat. Ambience was nice and management does justice to the money paid. Overall if you looking for an andhra meal without burning your pocket, this is the place to be. Its in the first floor, walkable from vega city mall. Giving it a 3.5, hope they come with more branches.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  New place so i ll start from wishing a good luck to them.
So we went their on a weekday, place was calm with decent crowd. We had lemon chicken, Chicken maharaja,Pepper chicken, Egg curry, paneer manchurian and chicken biryani.
All the items wer tasty. But, they need to work on the taste of chicken biryani.
Good service and ambience.
Quantity- value fr money

P.S : Reviewed on 25th Aug 2018')]

address: 688, Opposite IWWA Party Hall, 7th Main, BTM, Bangalore
name: The Shawarma Shop
dish_liked: Rumali Roti, Rumali Shawarma, Burgers, Shawarma Burger
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  This place is good if you wanna have a shawarma roll as a small snack. Since I only had a single kabbus shawarma roll I will be purely giving my review on that. In my opinion definitely not the best shawarma I have had. The quantity, the roll is so damn small that u can finish it in just 4 big bites. The taste is good but not as good when compared to other shawarma joints. The thing that disappointed me the most is the size of the roll. It's so small, it's like a mother shawarma gave birth to a premature baby shawarma. Definitely can be bigger for the price.
No complaints about the service.
Won't say that I recommend this place for a snack all the time."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  There is nothing better than getting shawarmas home delivered after a really long and tiring day!
What's better? They prepare the shawarmas right in front of the riders when they arrive so as to make sure that the food reaches warm.
They have a brilliant "customise your shawarma" option where you can literally create what you like and it will reach your plate hand crafted.
Thank you for the amazing food.
Cheers!'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  Just happend to be here at the wrong time probably!!!

Had all these Zomato and Swiggy guys swarming the place like flies , had to wait for 15mins for the food

??Ambiance?A small shop with clean surroundings?

??Food?Had the jumbo plate , Nothing great not a lotta chicken most of the plate was filled with onions and tomato?Such a let down

??Price?100bucks for a quick snack , resonable ?

?I doubt I'm ever coming back"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  When you are really really hungry your eyes start playing tricks on you. I read the ?Rumali Jumbo Whole Meat Shawarma? as ?Rumali Jumbo Whole Wheat Shawarma? and thought I had made a mistake by ordering too much. But when my order arrived, I realised the serving was not as unmanageable as I thought it would be.
Unfortunately due to the rain it took some time to be delivered - about 55 minutes as against the predicted 42 minutes. And that had a role to play in the cold serving. The main reason for just 3 Stars is because the garnish was not as indicated - I got one each of 1inch piece carrot and cucumber and half a chilli in a small plastic packet. Frankly, they need not have bothered. Taste-wise - nothing extra-ordinary.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The shawarmas at the shawarma shop are best in taste till now in Bangalore. As I really tasted previously tasteless shawarmas in Bangalore city. I am definitely gonna order again. Perfectly stuffed with chicken n other things. Rumali roti was soft yet not soggy. Stomach filling.')]

address: Shop 161,161A,166, First Floor, Vinayaka Nagar, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
name: Faasos
dish_liked: Rolls, Sabudana Vada, Veggie Wrap, Chicken Wrap, Dal Makhani, Paneer Wrap, Meat Balls
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Not every place that serves rolls is able to maintain their food quality and delivery standard like faasos has. Been the nth time that I have ordered food from here and I have never been disappointed.

This time I had their paneer tikka wrap and the quantity is just amazing. One roll and you are full! Also, the rolls are packed so well that it makes it easy to eat even while travelling.'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Ordered 2 items. One item was incomplete first time delivered. Hence Panda contacted Support. There on, all they are worried about is some OTP that the customer receives on phone.

The delivery boy is almost harassing for the OTP. Before he wasn't able to access the building to provide delivery but for the OTP he came to the door and rang bells constantly.

The delivery boy also wasnt ready to hand over the incomplete item until and unless i gave him the OTP. My food, i order, i pay, you profit and i get troubled? Hence people choose swiggy and not faasos delivery, all due to the overwhelming hassles and troubles. In future i wont order itself. Need food not a headache.

A very very very bad experience. Also since then, this faasos outlet has been constantly calling. Delivery is supposed to be a good experience not to irritate the customer to their core."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Ordered Navratri thali from fasoos. I was very happy with the thali.
The thali consisted of sabudana kichdi, 2 sabudana vada, paneer curry, hare tamatar ki subzi and sabudana kheer.
The subudana vada was really good. The tamatar subzi was very amazing. So unique. Very tangy. Loved it.
Didn't really like the sabudana kheer. It wasn't sweet at all.
Fasoos Navratri thali is the perfect festive food.
The packaging was done well."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Had ordered the singhada aloo paratha meal as part of the navratri special review program.

Did not for a moment felt that the meal was without onion and garlic. Liked the concept of separate meals for the festive season.

The taste overall was nice. Loved the sweet dish.
Everything in the meal was up to the mark the pack was enough for one person.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I ordered the aloo paratha combo during the navratri special meal offers.the food was delicious..the aloo paratha filling was delicious.the sabudana vada was the best in the combo.. They made a sweet out of raw mangoes which was nothing like I have tasted before.totally loved the combo.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  As a part of Faasos review program, got an opportunity to try Navratra meal.
I had ordered Singhada Aloo paratha panner, 1st of all the delivery was on time.
The packing of food was very well done. Quantity of food was enough for one serving.

Food 4/5'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Tried their navratri menu and I liked it. 

pros:
- good delivery 
- most of the items were good

cons:
- some items were too oily
- healthy and fresh options would be great to have on menu'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  As a Part of Faasos Navratri Review Program, I happened to try their Sabudana Khichidi Royal Satvik Meal. This meal consisted of Sabudana Khichidi, Tamatar Sabji, Paneer Makhanwala, Sabudana kheer and curd.

Firstly, the delivery was very much on time which needs to be appreciated. Secondly, the packaging was aptly designed in a way to avoid leakage of the food. Finally, coming to the food and the taste...this meal was very yummy. The quantities of items were pretty good for a single serving. The Sabudana Khichidi especially was the best..it's not only an ideal meal but also healthy as the name rightly suggests being Satvik. I'd definitely go for it again. Pricing on the other hand could be slightly towards the higher side. Nevertheless, this meal truly satiated my taste buds n thus I'd totally give it a thumbs up!"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  This was Faasos Navratri menu and I ordered Navaratri special thalli. As the thalli was not available I ended up getting this.
Whatever was there in the package was good, but I was expecting a lil bit more stuff like poori in the packet, because I was feeling like being overloaded with sabu dana. The package has sabu dana kichdi which was the best part of the meal, sabu dana kheer, paneer curry , curd etc.Everything was really simple which was good, but a little variety would have been better, like aamraas or flavoured lassi, poori n alu mutter etc.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Faasos, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore
.
We ordered from this outlet for lunch.
Ordered the following:
1. Cheese melt paneer wrap
2. Chicken Mayo wrap
3. Dal Makhni bowl half 1/2
.
The wraps were really good in taste. Though I feel the quantity has been reduced than it used to be before.
.
Dal Makhni was good in taste.
.
With Love
Thetechnifoodie'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The delivery as faster than expected. The chicken meatball wrap and chicken sausage wraps were awesome. The wraps were generously filled with chicken and sauce.')]

address: 175-176, Dollars Colony, Phase 4, JP Nagar, Bangalore
name: Mealer.in
dish_liked: Rajma, Dal Makhani, Kadhi Chawal, Dal Tadka
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I ordered food from mealer.
Packing of all food was great. Price was also reasonable.
Rajma rice was good in taste and also the quantity is good for one person. The rice was good but not as soft as I would like it to be, I guess it is personal preference.
Good flavours overall.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The food was so so so good.
Delivery was on time too. I ordered few snacks and a meal for more like evening snacks and dinner together.
Every dish I had ordered turned out to be delicious.
A definitely recommendation from my side.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  If you are hungry and you don't wanna step outside and want better choices in food than junk food, mealer to the rescue..
The food is amazing.
Quality wise and quantity wise and also money wise.
So many options in a delivery outlet makes me happy, because now I can keep ordering and trying more dishes.."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The sheer variety, veg and non veg options, the way they are packed stylishly and the way they get delivered every time on dot is like a precision clock work ...Their menu is extensive and so are the variants of desi khana...Dal Makhni is good.Kadhi chawal is good.I would recommend this place to everyone.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  On the contrary, I tried mealer for snacks.It was evening, I was back home early and not really in the mood to cook or go out. Just wanted to relax in my sweatpants and eat good food and watch some series.Saw mealer on zomato.They had ample of snack options and hence I placed an order.The Bombay masala sandwich was tasty.Also liked the masala omelette.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  2 out of 3 dishes were good but the third one didn't live up to my expectation and that's why I am deducting a star!The quantity was good enough but in the taste department I was slightly disappointed.

Delivery 4/5Packing 4/5
Quantity 3/5Taste 3/5"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This is the place if you are looking for home style affordable Indian food. The menu options are simple and straightforward.
Also they deliver in 30 minutes..The gravy I had ordered was tasty, wasn't expecting to like it so much, the gravy wasn't oily or too spicy - it was good."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I have ordered twice from them in the last one week.
The food is absolutely yummy.
The packaging is neat.
Delivered on time.
Quantity is good for one.
Also goes easy on your pocket. Covering everything and nothing disappointing.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  This totally surprised me. Was not having high hopes, but you (Mealer) surprised me. Ordered a pindi chole meal for lunch. The quantity is certainly more than enough for one. The taste was also fine. Topping that the price was also fine.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Trying from this place for the first time and was pretty impressed with the food.
Prompt delivery.
The meals are good option for lunch.
Dal tadka was really nice.
Quantity is good for one.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Tasty food well packed in a box. Really enjoyed it.
2 chapati n rajma rice in the meal along with curry, salad,pickle and papad. Thanks a lot.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Just ordered
1.Kadhai paneer,Dal tadka,tawa phulka meal,the taste was very gud but the Kadhai paneer was too spicy.
2.Dal tadka,bhindi,ajwan parantha meal served with pickle and salad,parantha was very very tasty and bhindi was also gud.
Must try items - Ajwan parantha with Dal tadka
5 star for delivery and packing.Keep it up guyz')]

address: 16th Main, 2nd Stage, BTM, Bangalore
name: Pathaan Sir
dish_liked: Rolls, Momos, Paratha, Chicken Tikka Roll, Mutton Keema, Egg Roll
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered Chicken Manchurian and French fries
Manchurian was OK in taste but a bit too oily which also affected it's taste
French Fries were also just OK
Well cooked but not crispy enough
This place seems to have good rolls though.. will have to try those"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Loved the taste of the roll. Great taste just loved it. ??
Best ever roll tasted. I had mushroom roll and just melted in the mouth. Great work. Would love to visit this place again and again. If you eat roll the must try is out. You would definitely love it. Thanks for the great taste.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  For this joint, only advice would be to stick to rolls only, especially non-veg ones. My favourite is 'Double Pathan special'. Although for a price point of 115 bucks, it's on expensive side.

Extras are not worth the bother. Stick to non-veg rolls only."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Ordered chicken fried momos from there.The taste was good although and delivery was also in time but was quite oily and the outer coat was very chewy. Had chicken nuggets also there and those were cold and not at all tasty'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  I got to know of Pathaan Sir through Zomato. Turns out they have 7 odd stores in Bangalore. So I choose this place when I felt like binging on rolls.
I ordered two combos. A combo has a roll, fries and momos. I tried the Pathaan special and spicy baby corn rolls. Fries you get are actually the masala fries that are quite common these days. But they didn't taste great. Wasn't fried well. Momos tasted below average. Probably the weakest item present in the combos. As far as the rolls are concerned, they are packed in long carton wraps, but the rolls are much smaller in comparison. I don't know whether they intentionally reduced the size because it comes in a combo. If they did, it doesn't make sense because one orders a combo to get more items of the same value at a lesser price. Rolls were ordinary I'd say.
Overall, quality was on the downside. No delivery issues though."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
 
I tried out their special chicken roll. It was pretty good with a very nice flavor. Very yummy
The chicken was soft and tasty. They give all their chicken varieties mixed in their Special roll. The bread for the roll was perfect. Definitely will try this place again'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  I have tried pathaan sir thrice, in a hope that i will get something better this time. The base of roll is too thick, not cooked properly. Their aloo tikka rolls and egg roll are one of the most tasteless rolls i ever had.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Best Rolls in BTM, hands down!

Pathan sir is located at the crossing after McDonalds and its difficult to miss. They make crispy, inviting, yummy kati rolls!

Lot of combinations are available but my usual favorite is Tandoori chicken with Egg. Being a regular UberEats take out customer, would highly recommend you to try it if you are around in BTM.

#RollingOver #IndiTraveller')]

[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  It's literally a place where u get what u pay for or may be little more.

I ordered for a Non-Veg Combo and I was honestly quite shocked when I got it.

There was ample amount of rice even though they say 'half biryani' and the parata's wer fine.
The gravy was ok but there was just ONE chicken pieces for the whole thing !!!!

So if ur reallllllyy broke and neeeed something to eat, y'all could try this place.

Peace.")]

address: 15, 24th Main Road, 1st Phase, JP Nagar, Bangalore
name: Stories
dish_liked: Cocktails, Pizza, Fries, Pasta, Chicken Sizzler, Mocktails, Long Island Iced Tea
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  We happen to visit this place on a weekend. Amazing food and ambience. Excellent service given by Mr.Karan. This place is a must visit. We ordered Reshmi silky kabab, chicken biryani and American barbecue chicken. Everything was perfect and loved the taste'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Amazing ambience, tasty food and great staff! Makes stories a stand alone place.

I loved the sizzlers there \U0001f929 a balance of spices made it enjoy it to the most


Must try: sizzlers

#rajeshwrites'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  It's decent place to hang out... Food is quite average. Good ambience though.Even the songs played were good.

F.ood:2.5
E.ntertainment:4
A.mbience:4
S.ervice:4
T.ry:pasta was quite OK.

Pizza was average, pasta was bit good. And I'm sure that's not BBQ.

#eatawesomeliveawesome"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Great food, open air cafe ambiance, good music and vibes! Loved the laidback feels. Perfect for a lazy brunch with good food and cocktails. Lived the farm fresh pizza. The ceaser salad could use some work though. Wasn't a big fan. Tried the margherita and tequila sunrise in the cocktails section. Wasn't really happy with the margherita. But tequila sunrise was very well made. They have zomato gold on food. So added point to that . They are definitely better than their rajajinagar counterpart Definitely would love to go back and try more of their menu.
Ambiance 4/5
Service 4/5
Food 3.5/5
Music 4/5
Staff 4/5
Drinks 3.5/5"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great ambiance, good food quantity n quality, Great service by Mr Milan.. recommended to be visited with company of friends.
No waiting required ..'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  On a weekday lunch - I liked the open air seating and ambiance is modern. Service was too slow and we had to remind the staff literally for everything.
We tried nachos - not good and the worst steak the ever had. Portions were limited and not worth the money we paid. Two star is only for the ambiance and location
They really need to know a thing about customer service.
Valet parking ?'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Really enjoyed the environment and the ambiance! The cool Bangalore air made it even more relaxing and enjoyable! The best part is it?s a roof top restaurant with cool breezes blowing at regular intervals. The food was pretty good! Caesars salad was average.. the Cajun fries were good .. the meaty barbecue pizza was really good and spicy... green apple mojito had the right punch! The brownie with ice cream was the best!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  With The Gastronome
Food - 4/5
Ambience - 4/5
Service -3.5/5
Meaty barbeque pizza, caesars salad, Cajun fries basket and Sizzling brownie are delicious.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have been to this place on Saturday night,it was crowded,we had to wait for around 30minutes.
stories has two sitting area, one is indoor and one is on roof top..we chose sit inside.. coming to Ambience part, it was not that impressive (3/5)..food and drinks are quite expensive.. coming to service not that great..need improvement in service.. overall average experience...'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Stories is a pretty little space. We couldn?t get the roof top seating, but the indoor seating was pretty too.
Coming to the food- ordered the Chinese mushroom starter along with their hara bara kabab sizzler,both of which were lip smacking \U0001f929
They have a new variety of Belgian beer- Simba. Worth a try.
Their servers are polite and friendly but they did mess up on our starter order and bill?
Would revisit to try the variety of food ??'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Great ambience and a cute little space but not so cool on a sunny day afternoon. Good for chitchats over a meal or drinks. I love the wings, lollipops and the Chinese starters here. Grills and bbqs disappoint a little and the prawns we ordered were not very fresh, looked and tasted very stale. Don't ask me why I ordered Biriyani here, blame me for it not being good, I knew that."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Was searching a place to have lunch and chit chat with friends near Gopalan mall and found this one.

Food and Price: Good continental food in an average price.

Ambiance: Roof top. Awesome view. But not a big place.

Service: Courteously staff and fast service.

PS: Parking could be a problem. Except it, all worth.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  A really nice place with amazing food.
Had ordered hara bhara tikka sizzler and farm fresh pizza. Both were excellent.
For starters we ordered batata bravas which wasn't that great. They serve u very less quantity and also taste wise it was average. So Id Prefer choosing fries over it.
Food:8.5/10
Ambience:8.5/10
Staff:8.5/10"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Stories is a highly grossed pub now a days. Everyone is rushing towards it because of its cool ambience and the quality of food they provide.
They have opened up a branch in JP Nagar so its like easily computable to there for many surrounding area.
We had bought some pizza and some variety of drinks which was great.
Definitely try this restaurant.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Stories was on my bookmark list since long time..got time to visit this place .. ambiance was good, ordered dusted french fries, BBQ Chicken, chatpata mushroom, Chicken lollipops, cosmopolitan and beer..i feel quantity of BBQ chicken was too less for the cost.service was not great should work on it..but it was great experience.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have visited Dr sheesha before, but this was my 1st visit to Stories. The food menu is almost similar. The ambience of this place was great, outdoor seating with lots of indoor plants all around. We ordered chicken lollipop in hot garlic, kung pao chicken, schezwan chicken fried rice. The food was good. Service could be better, the waiters seemed to be in a hurry and they took away the plate even before i had completed the food. Except that, a decent place to hangout.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Stories was on my bookmarks for quite a while now.
Finally visited this place for dinner.
Ambience was quite calm and fresh. The terrace seating seemed better personally.
Coming to the food, loved the mushroom and pepper starter.
I had Primavera veg for main course and loved the sauce but the problem was, it had too many vegetables. Basically, the ratio was off. There were as many veggies as pasta. So in the end I was left with a lotta Zucchini in sauce. Same with my friend?s chicken arrabiatta. Huge thing to improve upon!
Will surely return to try more.
Menu is quite basic. Nothing extra ordinary. But, worth a visit!'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I find this place lil cozy, ambience was fine with some slow music, fresh air,rooftop holds good.starters wre norm,must try their cheesy fries which was melting.... tried vodka shots,and their cocktaill combo...my worry is, smoking zone shld be banned in such places, since they have got nice ambience,and a good eatery place.it might be a disturbance,other then that service was good and yeah bon appetite:!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Ambience is okay if you are sitting on the balcony side but if you are sitting little inside it's hot and adequate fans are not installed. I ordered the hara bhara kebab sizzler, Schezwan mushroom, BBQ prawns and fish dish. Taste was good but spicy.
I found the staff less attentive and inspite of informing before that we have Zomato gold the bill didn't show the discount. Then after highlighting the same they changed the bill.
Good Option for people in JP Nagar for drinks and starters."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  yesterday we visited this place.It was crowded.it took 15mins to get a table.This is my 2nd visit and i am very happy for their improvements.we ordered chicken tikka, biryani,hula hula pizza,bacon wrapped prawn and two drinks.I am not sure if biryani was worth the hype or not.it was ok. bacon(chicken bacon)wrapped prawn and tikka were amazing.pizza was good.both the drinks 1.green apple virgin mojito(must try) and 2.planter punch are awesome. prices are increase from zomato menu.we had a great time.hassle free zomato gold service.keep it up guys.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's roof top and holds a great ambiance. Nice music. The choice of interior is good. Food portion and taste both are good. I found the price decetly quoted. Good place to hang out with friends. You might feel there is less options for vegans. Advanve reservation is suggested. No pics as I had lost my phone."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  The place is good and the Starters are also good. But they Lack in Service as the Waiters don't know head or tail about the items in the Menu and they have to ask and Come. The Rates are Quite Reasonable and food us Above Average. It's a good place to Unwind and Enjoy.

  Located in JP Nagar there's a great place that goes by the name Stories. The place is lively and has some great atmosphere. It has pretty good menu in terms of variety, from Italian to Indian, from pizzas to pastas. We ordered,
# Death by chocolate cake - it was very good but it was chocolate brownie not death by chocolate.
# Angels Eggs - which actually were deviled eggs
# Sizzler - Everything on that Sizzler was just lip smacking except it wasn't really a Sizzler, food was kinda cold for a Sizzler. Taste wise, just really good.

So here's the deal, whatever was served wasn't exactly what was told or written but tasted really really good,

My report card
Price ? 7/10
Taste ? 8/10
Portion size - 6/10
Service ? 5/10
Ambiance ? 7/10
Cleanliness - 7/10
Value for money ? 7/10
Will I go back ? Absolutely"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  The staffs need to be more co-operative, over all the food quality is good. The best part about the place is that they are open till 1 on a week day too.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Service is tooo slow in here and not pocket friendly too ? food taste is upto the mark not worth for the money ambience is okay ??? only starters are good enough better then the main course'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  My first visit in here .. but I had been to its brother hood Dr.sheesha earlier.
First thing I wanna right about is pasta ... It was so cheesy and mouth watering. We had also ordered the baby corn chilli where it was bit oily. . but the tatse was good.
And then comes the fish n prawns skewers it was not much spiced or not that tasty please make it in a way that consumer must also experience the taste of spices along with the meat.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The food is amazing ? really loved the place !it is not that big as rajajinagar's stories but thats ok! Ambience is amazing !   Stories the name of brand...visit first with my sister located jp nagar ..start with ambience .ambience is really peacefull according to the Monday it's really awsem ambience rating 5/4 .now go to drinks.ll have bira white ,Liit whice Is vry good bt iTs strong bt I like it ,jagerbomb shorts wHice is my favorite rating 5/5..now service staff is vry polite vry caring with guest .. special thanks to mrs.pavitra mam for make our day.thank u so much team Stories ..Keep it up...best of luck..come soon.???? Cheers."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Had been here on a saturday evening. Easily got table in spite of being a weekend which hardly happens in Bangalore. Place looked neat, decent and very tranquil.
We ordered chicken Manchurian, grilled paneer in BBQ sauce, grilled chicken in BBQ sauce, over loaded cheesy fries with peri peri sauce and Margherita pizza. None of the dishes disappointed us. Taste was really good & prices are decent too.

Just wanted to leave a constructive feedback to the restaurant : 1. There were no forks on the table & we had to repeatedly tell the waiters to arrange for one after the food was served.

2. We had been there for a friend's birthday celebration, we handed over the cake box to the waiter asking him to get it in a plate. He did so. Later, while we were done with cake cutting, asked the same waiter to put the cake back in the box, we learnt that he had already threw it. Somehow, he adjusted the entire cake in a normal parcel box by cutting it into multiple pieces."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  There is surely a "story" to tell based on my experience

My friends and i chose to try this place on a monday evening, we arrived there at around 7.45 PM. The restaurant was almost free, we got a table just as we walked in, the Ambience is right on point, the taste of the food was good but not exceptional. The problem was that even though the restaurant was so free, they took almost 30 mins to get us the mocktails we ordered. The main course was served after 5 to 10 mins. Later we ordered another drink, again they almost took 30mins to serve. Because of the service i haven't given them a perfect five on five.
That was my story.
Hope this helps you,
Thank you.

Ps: Added advantage is that there is valet parking system which is very helpful. It literally took the tension from my shoulders, i was really happy about it and im sure you will be happy with that service too.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Stories is one of the most happening pubs in Bangalore. I went there with a group of friends for a relaxed lunch after my tests. The food was great! We ordered quite a lot ? but the service was slow and half the things weren't available. We got our beverages as soon as we ordered, while we were placing our order for the food. That imbalance kinda ruined a bit of our fun. But overall, this place is beautiful ? Good ambience and I really suggest you to visit there at least once, for their amazing food."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  The decor was pretty decent and simple. The service was fine too.
Coming to the food part, i ordered for a fries basket, perfectly crisp french fries. And nothing much to comment about it. I prefer spicy food anywhere I go and so I placed an order for Spicy Chipotle chicken. I'd rate that 2/5. It was nothing spicy and also was too dry. Hence, the rating 3/5."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Ordered tandoori panneer and fries. Not that great taste. Ambience is good but not maintained. We experienced a staff member who had attitude or not sure if his day was not going well.   Ordered food here seeing the Ad on Zomato. Just done with it and I am totally disappointed!

address: 766/A, 16th Main Road, BTM 2nd Stage, Bangalore
name: Yum In My Tum
dish_liked: Momos, Manchow Soup, Pizza Sandwich, Spring Roll, Noodles, Fries, Fried Rice
cuisines: Chinese, Continental, Fast Food, Healthy Food
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Found this place when I needed a quick bite.
A small & friendly outlet in BTM. It has a very cozy feel to it. The staff is very friendly & food is also good.
I tried Momo prepared in Smoked Garlic Sauce & Peri Peri Fries, both of which were upto the mark.
If u need something to bite into when you are in BTM, please visit this.

?? Taste 4.5/5
?? Ambience 4.5/5
?? Service 5/5
?? Hygiene 4.5/5
?? Value for money 5/5'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  It is alright that is all I can say about the food, I ordered it in. Schezwan Noodles and Baby Corn Manchurian. The Noodles was really great! But the Baby Corn Manchurian was really disappointing. The sauce was out of place & sweet. And it was very dry to be a dry starter.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Having a craving for Chinese I ordered panner rice combo with Yum in My Tum. It seems to nice seeing the rating of 4 but after receiving the food I think it?s paid. The food was so pathetic that I will not have Chinese for months now..mood spoiled to heights.. rice was chilli garlic which was not at all chilli garlic and uncooked, panner chilli as starter is ok but not so good in taste, paneer manchurian gravy is nothing more than that paneer salt gravy... I think salt is gst free so used in bulk. The only good thing in taste is veg momos which I had with bottle of beer! You need lots of improvement guys !
Packing is great ! No issues In that ! 2 for that only'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  A small indo-chinese cafe in Btm stage 2. I didn't expect much when I visited. But to my surprise, I would say a pleasant one, they serve really nice Momos, noodles and soup. I tried their hot n sour soup and veg cheese Momos. Was really impressed. So as the name suggests yum in tum and that too without burning a hole in your pocket. Isn't it a great deal.."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Thanks @yuminmytum_blr for inviting me to your cute outlet ??? Thanks biplove (chef) for serving us such a yummy dishes.

My review for this cafe;

Dumplin soup -5/5 ( one of the best soup i ever tried )

crispy mayo tossed - 4/5 ( Momo's with Mayonese sauce ?) chilli sessame- 3.5/5
paneer onesta - 3/5

momo cheese sandwich - 5/5 ( my favorite one)

Overall I would rate this cafe 4/5 coz the price for each dish are so reasonable. It starts from Rs 40 -Rs 300.

Everyone who loves Chinese dishes must give a try to this cafe @yuminmytum_blr"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  We ordered Machow Soup, Thupka, Schezwan Chopsuey..
Soup was really good..
But not atall happy with the rest 2 dishes..
Place is very nice.. Small but good ambience..
Staffs are very polite and friendly..
Food quality : Good..
Food quantity : More Than Enough for 2 / 3 people.. ??
Pocketfriendly place..

#GoingToTrySomeOtherDishesHere')]

address: 175-176, Bannerghatta Main Road, Dollars Colony, Behind Vodafone Store, Phase 4, JP Nagar, Bangalore
name: Biryani Miya
dish_liked: Chicken Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Satisfied with the awesome taste, good quality and quantity, but when they deliver it's better if they check the packed the food properly or not.."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  One dish that I can eat a lot of times without ever getting bored by it has to be biryani.
I have tried biryani in bangalore in so many places and my recent find was biryani miya.
I stay in JP Nagar and usually I go to kormangala or indiranagar but that day I really wasn't interested to travel.
The food came on time.
It was hot and I thoroughly enjoyed the taste."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I am a big Biriyani lover, i can even eat biriyani in all three course of meal.

On opening the lid, the aroma that wafted out was stupendous. The biryani itself had quite a nice colour combination and the taste was marvelous...Highly recommended to all!'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Deceitful and disappointing.
(Delivery only review)
Almost all other reviews here are deceitful/fake/paid, look at their dine-lines and all of them have mysteriously reviewed same places with ratings only 4 and above. Hope Zomato takes note of this.

Pros:
1. The quality of ingredients is above average.
2. Biryani accompaniments are noteworthy and tasty.

Cons:
1. The Zomato images to the actually biryani are worlds apart! Please refer to my uploads.
2. The high price no where justifies a 4 cp tray packaging, which usualy is for executive service only.
Biryanis as this price point are supposed to be more worthy than quick meals.
3. It is absolutely not hyderabadi or any other know styles of biryani, tastes more close to masala/fried rice.
4. Quantity wasn't sufficient either.

Overall, other than fresh veggies in raita and taste of salan/gravy served with biryani, everything else is avoidable and disappointing."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This is not a let down place at all.I am so glad that JP Nagar is getting so many new places!I love it...Delivery was a little delayed but the food made up for it.
Biryani is soul food and I thoroughly enjoyed my food...
Recommended!!!')]

address: Shop 1, 1st Floor, BTM Complex, 9th Main Road, Layout 1st Stage, BTM, Bangalore
name: Basmati Delights
dish_liked: Tandoori Chicken, Mutton Biryani, Andhra Biryani, Raita, Hyderabadi Dum Biryani, Chicken Boneless Biryani, Vegetable Biryani
cuisines: Biryani, Chinese, Mughlai, Fast Food, Kebab
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  There was a time, when this place was only a stone's throw away and we were probably the most frequent customers. When they just started operations, their Biryani portions were huge and they served chicken biryani with a large sized chicken raan - excellent but inconvenient to share. 

We were big fans of the biryanis (both mutton and chicken) and the salan and even bigger fans of the chicken 65. The kebabs were a good bet as well. Even to this day, there's days when we brave Silkboard traffic just because the taste buds cannot be satiated with any of the alternatives. I do hope they maintain their standards and keep the taste true."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I had been craving for some good Andhra Biryani and luckily came across this place called Birinz in BTM over last weekend. In case you haven?t had a typical Andhra Biryani before, I highly recommend you to try it out. Birinz is a very simple restaurant with basic seating that serves mouth-watering food. Their menu had Chinese and Andhra assortment of grubs and we enjoyed every single food that we ordered. ...
Read full post on nibblesdiary.wordpress.com'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Paneer biryani and butter chicken biryani. @birinzblr was previously knows as bawarchi and serves varieties of biryani having both veg and non veg options. It's served in 2 portions I.e. personal and regular, so that the portion of food is not wasted.
You can either order or just visit the place to enjoy the biryani. ??"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I ordered a paneer biryani from there and it was good. The quantity of rice was enough for a person. They also gave raita and onion with it. I liked it!!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  People ditch, but Biryani never ditches........
ell, this stands true for "Birinz", a recently opened paradise for Biryani lovers in BMT, Bangalore. 
Guys if you're travelling to Bangalore anytime soon, this is surely your one stop for lunch/dinner. 
I've tried the "Reddy's Chicken Biryani"& "Butter Chicken Biryani"which are lip smacking & unique in their taste with generous amounts of flavour to it. 
Their "Rayalseema Chicken Dry"was a stunner dish!!    A chicken dish with just the right proportions of flavor.....
All the biryani lovers pick up pace, and get ready to tickle your taste buds......
A must try restaurant with humble service.......'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Birinz as the name suggests is a place for biriyani.. they serve different varieties of biriyani. The starters here are decent too. The best of the lot I tried was the butter chicken biriyani and the chicken dum biriyani. I loved their gin powder rice too.
For vegetarians they have good options too. I loved the mushroom chilli garlic, paneer sholay. Golden baby corn was okay.
Ambience is okay. Service is quick.

cupcakesontravel.blogspot.com')]

address: 950, 16th Main Road, 2nd Stage, BTM, Bangalore
name: Punjabi Swag
dish_liked: Lassi, Murgh Lababdar, Makke Ki Roti, Chaap, Butter Paneer, Butter Chicken, Patiala Paneer
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  A cool Dhaba style ambience. We opted for some special dishes so the price is a bit higher. apart from that food quality was good , quantity is also good.. We have chicken nun parathas, some special dishes lassi.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Awesome and unique ambience in the heart of Btm. Loved the chicken lababdar. The ambience gives u a feeling of real pujabi dhaba in Bangalore.'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  One of the new reasturants in BTM, ambience is pretty simple , food is like any other Punjabi reasturants, veg dishes are between good and very good, non veg dishes can be better, price wise it's ok, staff is ok.. nothing much to write home about, typical Punjabi reasturant....there are no special dishes that u will certainly come back for ..."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Went there for the second time last night, and it wasn't a bad experience but what I did not like at this place was the poor behavior of the staff.
Tried their Paneer Khazana and lassi and chapatis.
Food was decent, but the outlet should be a little cleaner and hygienic.
Plates were dirty too.

pleased my taste buds? - yes.
burnt a hole my pocket? - not really.
had a punjabi vibe? - yes.
was the staff courteous? - could've been better."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Punjabi Swag is a North Indian dhaba style place that offers very good Punjabi food items. The ambience is truly of a dhaba and also the music played there is very lively. I have tried a number of items but their Butter Chicken definitely stands out. It is awesome and a must-try item. Masala Papas, Garlic Naan, and Cuole Kulche are also tasty. Service is slow and needs to be improved. They keep the restaurant open till late in the night so it's a good choice for the late night cravings."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Today I visited panjabi swag. Place was so amazing, full of panjabi flavours, spices. And that aroma of ingredients was mind blowing. Hat's off to chef because he knows how to put spices perfectly aand how to balance dish. That creaminess, spiciness of chaap was outstanding. Sarso ka saag was perfectly balanced and full of flavours and when you will take a bite of sarso ka saag with makke ki rooti you will feel like you are in panjab. And I had best dalmakhni of my life. And about my favourite part dessert, Without dessert there is nothing in life and that gajar ka halwa was literally too good. Nice ambiance you will feel like you are in panjab. Great hospitality!!! At last if food will put a smile on your face that food deserves more than 10 rating. Thank you panjabi swag you guys made my day!!!!"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Found a great outlet to have some great North Indian Punjabi style food. Menu is short and concise but they have done a great job in making food delicious. Sarson ka saag and makke ki roti made my day along with paneer tikka as a starter. Staff was great, friendly and service was really fast.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  I ordered Malai Chaap and some Paneer dish from this restaurant few days ago. It was ok in taste. So we thought to try the Chaap again with Chicken Tikka as this is a punjabi again.
Then after ordering from here via Swiggy, my concept of trying every Punjabi Restaurant in Bangalore, got changed.
I ordered Achaari Chaap and Chicken Tikka today. The achaari chaap was boiled and mixed with Achaar masala(from the achaar we found in Supermarket) and Chicken Tikka was not cooked well.
@Restaurant: If you want to check how to cook Chaap, then go to Gurgaon/Noida. You will definitely learn how to make Tandoori chaap/Malai Chaap/Masala Chaap/Hariyali Chaap/Achaari Chaap. Also visit Delhi in between to learn Chicken Tikka.
For Chicken Tikka, You can also visit Khan Saheb outlet in Jayanagar.
So its an advice: If you will cook better, then we will share your positive reviews otherwise will definitely share your bad reviews.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered from this place on a week day afternoon. The delivery was prompt and packaging was ok. We ordered Chicken tikka masala (good), garlic naan (fine), and aloo pyaaz paratha (not good. Also there wasn't any pickle or chutney accompanying it). Prices are decent compared to the quality. Overall:
Food - 3/5
Delivery - 4/5
Packaging - 3/5
Vfm - 4/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good Place to try Punjabi food in BTM ,Friendly staff very good service , food quantity is very good , i was surprised with the quantity of Paneer they give in the paneer dishes .
One to the good places in BTM to have pocket friendly dinner.
They also have soya chaap which you can try which i found okay as i earlier had in Baba Chatkora which was very good .

Try Paneer Dishes. (They had a special paneer also iguess the anme was Paneer Tada which is ot on menu , you can ask about this .It was very good)'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  A small restaurant with brilliant starters but mains are a let-down. Lassi is sufficiently thick to qualify it as an authentic Punjabi restaurant. No cream floating on the lassi though.

To get to this place, turn left (if arriving from silk board) when you reach Udupi Signal. Walk/drive past Akshay Grand and you'll reach a crossroad. Punjabi Swag is just after the crossroad. It is diagonally opposite the corner liquor store.

Seating consists of wicker chairs and low tables. It means you will scream in agony after a few minutes if you have a big bum (I have). Your only hope are the two normal tables located at the back.

Attentive staff."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This is... By far... the best restaurant that I?ve been to ( in terms of the taste of food) in Bangalore.
It?s not a big restaurant and has a limited seating, but the kind of food they serve here is out of this world.
I?d give 11/10 to the food here.
The staff is also polite and courteous.
The food served here is authentic punjabi.
Everyone in Bangalore should try their butter chicken.
The chef also recommended their bestselling appetiser, Dhanno Chicken, to us which was again worth the money.
I?ve not had everything in the menu but I can assure that everything that you?d order here would be Value for Money.
Their ambience gives it a feel of a highway side Punjabi Dhaba. They play the best ever punjabi songs.
Must visit.
Can?t wait to visit again and explore their menu.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I love punjabi restaurants. Mostly because of their ambiance. Good music, friends and the perfect dinner is all you need. Don?t forge to try chicken patiala. It?s no on the menu but you can order separately'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Small place
great food
Must visit for those who love punjabi food
We ordered biryani and butter chicken
It was amazing
Do visit this place for wonderful punjabi food'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Loveddd the non veg combo at 99/- My first time trying tandoori momo.. delicious.. 2 tandoori roti an amazing dal, cauliflower sabzi and rice. Thank you Punjabi swag :)'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED

  Here review related to veg / paneer / mashroom biryani.... Don't prefer here for biryani , these people not have proper skills in preparing biryani....... Biryani lovers don't try here... U guys definitely hate it.... the gravy they provide with biryani is no where fit for biryani"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  It use to be good but now a days they are no making good food. i tried paneer recently it was awfully bad. please concentrate on your dishes...'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Found this place by accident.
Absolutely love the energy of the place and it's owner!
The ambience is fun and very Punjabi.
And you muuuuust try the malai chaap! It's amazing!
Love eating here!"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Found this place by accident. Truly gives one the feel of punjab with their punjabi music and dhaba type of ambience. We ordered
1) Butter chicken- A must try dish loaded with butter. The staff is kind enough to let us know before ordering that it will be bit sweeter. We didn't mind that and we did not regret this decision. The yummiest butter chicken I tried lately.
2) Chicken Rara: this is semi gravy and not dry like it was mentioned. This was bit tangy and spicy with onion tomato base. Loved this too. However we wanted it to be more tangy hence added lemon juice to it ?
3) Tandoori Butter Roti: This was freshly made with quite generous amount of butter.
4) Lassi: Obviously.. How could we leave this place without punjabi lassi? Lassi was quite good but it proved to be too heavy for us.
Worth visiting this place. Dishes are slightly expensive. Not too light on the pocket. Seating is very limited. Staff is courteous and quick"), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  Happen to order the tandoori chaap here, too spicy!!! Couldn't finish even half.

address: 32, 16th Main Road, 1st Cross, Mahadeshwara Nagar, BTM 2nd Stage, Bangalore
name: The Bong Palate
dish_liked: Mutton Kosha, Basanti Pulao, Chicken Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ordered in for a working lunch from here via the Zomato app
Found them on the under 99 section for meals
Got excited but sadly not happy
The quantity good packing good but taste no no
I have eaten Bengali food elsewhere hence do know the difference from good Bong food and not so great Bong food
The Bengali fish thali had
Fish curry with a piece of fish was tasteless
Dal watery and tasteless again and very bland
Fried onions
Lots of rice and
A tomoto chutney gone totally wrong
Please do look into your Tate issues'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Updated: The owner called and apologized and even after refusing because of the late night. He came to give the correct order.

Great customer service!

*******************

AVOID.

Bad food.
Bad quantity.
Bad packaging.

And absolutely shameful Bengali food. Anyway, cheers! Never again

So Zomato wants me to write 140 characters, but I don't feel like wasting my time on this.")]

reviews_list:
[('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Honestly the worst pizza I've ever had. The base is not good, toppings are stale, even cheese doesn't taste right.

  Okies this is going to be a painful review. I know you guys are delivering food at night but at least try delivering average food for god?s sake. Feel kind of duped by the huge discounts on offer, and that kind of made me order.

I ordered the ?all meat? with thick crust for around rs 250 bucks. Guys I know it?s cheap for a pizza, but that doesn?t mean you can send me a roti topped with pieces of meat and cold cheese. It was horrible.

I have even added some pictures, but I am not sure whether people will misinterpret to be a good pizza. The true star of these pictures was the camera quality and not the pizza being clicked.

I?m sorry for such a bad review, but I?m so furious of what was delivered. Definitely going for MOJO Pizza next time. At least theirs are edible and have a much better portion size for similar prices.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Cheese is an important part of the equation in any pizza. Most are drowning in it, and that's typically what I like. But generally the quality of the cheese is overlooked. Crunch strategically places less cheese on their pizzas but the quality of the fresh mozzarella more than makes up for the amount. Combine that with fresh tomatoes and basil, huge pieces of pepperoni and sausage on top of a crispy outside - soft inside crust and you got yourself a fresh, light and outstanding pie. Mmmm, it was so good."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  I don't think I've ever come across a type of food that brings such fervent debate. Subjectivity is taken to a whole new level when it comes to pizza, but I think in the end, there might be too many factors and preferences involved.   Crunch Pizza specializes in one thing: Simple, straight-forward pizza.

No pazazz and no BS, Crunch Pizza sells the original thin crust style pizza and its simplicity is the exact reason why the pizza is so good! Even if you don't plan to order a meal from here, it's imperative that you grab atleast a small one from here if you are visiting bangalore! I highly recommend getting just the cheese pizza (180 rupees) so you can taste the true pizza without any distractions."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I had some pizza from Crunch the other day and it was pretty darn good. The service received was great. The staff really went above and beyond to make sure I was a satisfied customer. The delivery was pretty fast and I will order again.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  AWWWWW...YEEEEEEEEEEEAHHHH.

Came to this side for the first time, so, of course, something my friends and I had to get was a slice of thin crust style pizza. I'm not sure why we decided on Crunch Pizza, except probably because I'm on a special diet and needed to find a place that could accommodate the diet as best as possible. Basically, I needed as little carbs as possible (yeah, I know, it's truly impossible with pizza).
One friend ordered a slice of the cheese pizza, another with pepperoni and cheese, and I ordered the babe's demise pizza with spinach. At around 200 bucks a piece, these slices were the size of our head. And sooo delicious. Yum."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  Yummy, cheap, big slices. A great place to fill your gut with stuff in bangalore for less bucks. Nothing fancy or amazing, but it gets the job done.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  INCREDIBLE PIZZA: I got the Margarita Pizza - hot and delicious (the whole tomatoes mixed in the sauce is pretty clever - it adds bursts of juiciness as you chow down, without making the crust soggy. And mmmm, the crust!'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This place is a great find! The pizza is fantasic - thin, crispy crust with chewy, amazing sauce that tastes like San Marzano tomatoes, and savory goody mozzarella.   I've been given a challenge... find the best slice of pizza in bangalore. Now, I know many people have set out on this daunting, some would say impossible task, but a challenge is a challenge!   Unbelievably amazing pizza!! Don't miss out! Fresh-- they make their sauce peeling their own tomatoes, cheese etc."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  My wife and I found Crunch a on our recent bangalore trip. Best pizza we've ever had! The crust, the cheese the toppings. If you're looking for authentic thin crust pizza Crunch is a must!"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Best pizzeria in the area, and a lot better than most of the pizzerias I have ordered from.   Best pizza I've had! Service was fast and the pizza was affordable.

Ordered a slice of fresh mozzarella and sausage.

The fresh mozzarella was just slightly chewy and the sauce was a touch sweet with a hint of basil. A great combination. The sausage added a nice layer of spice to the standard cheese pizza. They did not skimp and every bite was loaded!

What made the pizza so good was that it was so crispy without being overcooked. Loved it!

Really Really bad experience."), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Had ordered from Crunch yesterday. It was scrutinizing terror. They didn't deliver at all, weren't picking up. I think they've got a bunch of fake reviews in order to drive ratings up. Please do not order. Shame on Zomato for even considering them onto your platform for online orders."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  What to say? I think I am in love or addicted or both, definitely something awesome. Pizza the way you like it , is a promised land not many find. I found it(tears of joy)! Enough said.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  The picture gives a crystal clear idea about the quality of pizza and packing. The seasoning was provided in a menu taped with electricity tape. The pizza seemed like it was cooked 2 hours back even though it had been just 48 minutes since I ordered. The box they delivered the pizza in was large and the pizza size was regular which is quite evident from the picture. All in all, extremely poor experience.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Substandard outlet with third class response for online order. I have had better pizzas in third tier cities of India. Worst cooks in Bangalore and have no sense of culinary. Do not order any food from these guys as you will only be wasting your time. Wish I could rate them any lower. A big zero for Zomato also to onboard these people on the App.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  The delivery time was extensive, the pizza was moist and soggy when arrived, the crust was chewy and the taste of the pizza was not good.. do not recommend crunch pizza.. and dont go by the photos on the page, it is not the same'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  I called Crunch pizza  but the person who answered was very disrespectful and rude and probably drunk too and when I told him to cancel the order he abruptly disconnect the call.AVOID THIS PIZZA SHOP AT ALL COST!'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  The delivery warehouse is shit as hell. All things including oven, refrigerator and the assembly counter were unhygienic. The photos shown above are photoshopped as obvious.'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  Pathetic quality for the given price!! The cheese is more like crushed fresh paneer which is roasted and toasted, the bread is like rusk, hard and dry and really mostly burnt and the toppings is poor and pathetic quality!! I can for certain say this chain makes big claims while ripping off us Indian customers cause many don't have access to fresh mozzarella. The cheese that is good supposed to be mildly chewy and elastic rather than burnt and powdered!! If I had the choice to get my money back I would take it any day!! At least come 50 percent near your claims!! What a waste of time and money it's has been!! On top you serve a hot coke"), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED

  Ordered for a pizza at 8.10 pm. It's 9.30 and yet to receive our pizza. The restaurant is not answering the phone. Poor delivery and response from Crunch Pizzas.
