reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Visited this place yet again today. Catching up with friends. Never disappoints.
Had the corn and chilly chowder, that's my favourite thing to have here. And it's filing. I liked the pizza this time round, Mexicorn Pizza, was yummy and loved the crust as well.
Plus, tried couple of dishes from their new menu, the kung pao lotus root, loved this dish. And also the chef's special hot pot, was really flavoursome.
And also, My friend and I, usually used to work from here sometimes. It's one of our fav go to places. Quite and peaceful as well."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Nice place for vegetarians but didn't impress me much.
The seating is cute but very uncomfortable. The washrooms can be cleaner and taken better care of.
Also, there's no parking nearby so that can be a concern."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  When you're in search of a nice cozy place which serves you veg food then this is your perfect destination.
With combination of North Indian and continental food available it satisfies all kinds of tastebuds.
My review for this place is
Food 4/5
Ambience 4/5
Service 3/5
Cost for 2 800-1000"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  It is a great place for a Friday evening.
Ambience is great food is great .

We had Americanism , vergin mohito for drinks .drinks were okay okay nothing great .
We had Chinese bhel, Mezze platter , and veg sizzlers . Everything is good but bit over priced . We had cupcakes and brownies for deserts . Everything was good . Specially , I liked hummus and cupcakes .'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  The ambience of the place and service is good. Although due to some renovations the menu is SO limited. I was unhappy with the plates they served us in and the paper cup of lemon soda was over priced for the quantity. We saw a few people get up to leave as soon as they saw the menu.
I don't see why guests need to enter this place if there is renovations going on. Also, the place was a little dusty.

NOT throwing hate. But this beautiful place has its crowd left a little disappointed because of the inconvenience, which could have been avoided easily."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Beautiful ambience. Quite and calm. A good choice for a romantic dinner as well. Food is good especially kulhad ki chai, soya Kheema Pav, aloo takki, hing aloo with methi puri.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  All I can say is itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s a cuty place with fresh food, if youÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92ve a gang to shout and celebrate please search a celebration place like any pubs or resto bar who has the same energy level neighbours as well'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We now have great pet friendly cafe options in blore. As a pet owner I was always skeptical about taking my pet out to a place I was unsure about. I headed to green theory as my friend strong y suggested that I try this place. You will fall in love with the place. It is surely the coolest pet friendly cafe in blore. They area pet friendly menu too, to make sure ur pooches have a good time..'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's an amazing cozy place located in peaceful area away from hustle bustle of town.Its catering great variety of tea as well as healthy options in beverage,they need to improve bit in their food flavours,rest it's worth going there ."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I would rate 3.5 rather. Went around 11.30 am, cleaning and some renovation work was going on. Honestly, place looked fine, maybe it looks better in evening with all lights and all.
Ordered papaya salad, which was little better than fine, platter that we ordered was just fine types. Taste can be much worked upon and items on platter too. I think much work needs to go in based on 2-3 items i trued.. maybe i tried limited things but i look for something new, innovative or if menu serves common items then some excellent taste in same old things ;)'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

  OMG!!! This place is just beautiful. The food here is delicious. The ambience is lovely. The staff is super supportive. Must try Oreo Cheesecake, Farmhouse Pizza, and Chinese Bhel. French fries were good too.
Idk why but the atmosphere in this restaurant was so peaceful yet beautiful. They don't have a much no of tables available so you might have to wait for sometime to get a table.
I would suggest that visit this place after 6pm.
Overall ratings:
Ambience - 4/5
Food - 4/5
Staff - 5/5"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED

  Good place with good vibes and good ambience. I ordered stuffed mushroom crunchy, multi grains pita pockets with falafel, Pasta with tomato garlic and basil sauce and I must say they were pure delight for my tastebuds... Ps-they don't serve you extra sauces."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The way the place has been set up is so unique and pleasing with these pretty little lights spread across the trees.
And plus itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s pet friendly.♥?
Ordered the brownie shake and pull apart garlic bread.
CouldnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t try main courses
But the shake was righty done; Pull apart garlic bread was so full of cheese and super filling.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ambience:4/5
Service:3/5
Had been here with my friends for lunch.
First of all the place is really small and can't serve a big group of people.
It was pretty hard getting the staffs attention to place our order.
We ordered
>Green theory Nachoes
>Babycorn potato cigars
>French fries and potato wedges
We also wanted a few other starters but they were unavailable which was quite disappointing .
The Nachoes were good but the babycorn potato cigars were really bad would definitely not recommend that .
>Margarita pizza
>Farmhouse pizza
>Pesto pasta with spinach
>Pasta in creamy mushroom sauce
The pizzas were good not that great the pesto pasta was really bad but the mushroom sauce pasta was good ."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  As everyone knows , this is a vegetarian place. Was forced here by a vegan friend who wanted me to be vegetarian Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93for a changeÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 ....well dint work! Extremely cafe style place with lots of mosquitoes- they were kind to offer a repellent to no avail !! I ordered the paneer sizzler I dint fancy it at all. Tried washing it down with a brownie shake which was watery as hell. 2 points only for the staff very courteous. Unfortunately this place isnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t for me.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Beautiful ambience, great good and great location( being in the heart of the city) pretty much sums it up. The menu is quite robust for a all vegetarian place and have a beautiful way to bring out the great flavour to want more. The low seating area kind of gives it a homely feel to the restaurant.
Ambience is great for high tea or an early supper and follow through with a conversation.
Usually it gets busy during the weekends but walking in without a reservation on the weekday is fine. One can expect to shell out about INR 1000 for two over a meal.
Do try their Herb soup, Broccoli and peanut stir fried salad and garlic bread.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Green Theory is quite a popular name for vegetarian food in the city. One Sunday evening, we decided to try the place. Though it looked beautiful with lush greenery, the mosquitoes were a big irritation. To top that the use of coils was annoying. We ordered for a green theory sampler & Thai papaya salad along with Watermelon basil cooler & Darjeeling silver white tea. Not a single dish stood out. The platter was really bad. It consisted of corn potato cigars,broccoli rolls,tomato bruschetta, nachos,paneer satay. Below average stuff. Thai papays salad was better but still very ordinary both in taste & looks. Drinks were the worst of the lot. Tea had no flavours at all. The less I speak abt the cooler the better. Pricing is also not really reasonable but then they have Zomato Gold. A very below par experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Travelled over two hours for this place, it was worth the travel. The ambience was excellent. We spent two hours and did not realise how quickly time went.

The food was great, I went with some of the reviews here.
Paneer satay starter was good, papaya lemon was okayish. Nothing extraordinary about it . We also tried the corn chilly chowder soup. The taste was excellent minus the ton of small green chilly present in the soup.

We then tried spinach pasta which was okay. It was a bit too dry for my taste. We tried veg au gratin which was delicious. We also tried a dish suggested by the waiter, consisting of paneer and Mexican rice. It was good.

For desserts we had tried Oreo cheesecake and savoury tart. Both of them were delicious.

I had a great time, would love to come back again. A bug thanks to Zomato gold also!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ambience was okay okay. We had ordered for Thai fried rice which tasted good and also a farmhouse pizza.Bevrage I had ordered was brownie shake which was not so good

  Beautiful ambience, great good and great location( being in the heart of the city) pretty much sums it up. The menu is quite robust for a all vegetarian place and have a beautiful way to bring out the great flavour to want more. The low seating area kind of gives it a homely feel to the restaurant.
Ambience is great for high tea or an early supper and follow through with a conversation.
Usually it gets busy during the weekends but walking in without a reservation on the weekday is fine. One can expect to shell out about INR 1000 for two over a meal.
Do try their Herb soup, Broccoli and peanut stir fried salad and garlic bread.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Green Theory is quite a popular name for vegetarian food in the city. One Sunday evening, we decided to try the place. Though it looked beautiful with lush greenery, the mosquitoes were a big irritation. To top that the use of coils was annoying. We ordered for a green theory sampler & Thai papaya salad along with Watermelon basil cooler & Darjeeling silver white tea. Not a single dish stood out. The platter was really bad. It consisted of corn potato cigars,broccoli rolls,tomato bruschetta, nachos,paneer satay. Below average stuff. Thai papays salad was better but still very ordinary both in taste & looks. Drinks were the worst of the lot. Tea had no flavours at all. The less I speak abt the cooler the better. Pricing is also not really reasonable but then they have Zomato Gold. A very below par experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Travelled over two hours for this place, it was worth the travel. The ambience was excellent. We spent two hours and did not realise how quickly time went.

The food was great, I went with some of the reviews here.
Paneer satay starter was good, papaya lemon was okayish. Nothing extraordinary about it . We also tried the corn chilly chowder soup. The taste was excellent minus the ton of small green chilly present in the soup.

We then tried spinach pasta which was okay. It was a bit too dry for my taste. We tried veg au gratin which was delicious. We also tried a dish suggested by the waiter, consisting of paneer and Mexican rice. It was good.

For desserts we had tried Oreo cheesecake and savoury tart. Both of them were delicious.

I had a great time, would love to come back again. A bug thanks to Zomato gold also!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Lovely place. Great food. Good service. Reminds you of the "old bangalore" from the 90's. Nice outdoor seating.. Excellent menu.. something for everyone. Truly enjoyed our meal.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Rarely do we visit an ALL veg place and so when we do, our expectations are high.

And we were not let down. Simply loved their Raw Papaya Salad and Thai curry rice. Their mezze platter was good too. The mushroom soup definitely needed improvement and so did the sizzlers but overall a good meal, well made, good flavours in a nice cozy environment. Service was nice with good friendly staff.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Cute and cosy place on a quiet street just off the noisy and bustling Residency Road. I went to Green Theory for my birthday dinner with my extended family and it was a lovely experience.

Houses converted into restaurants are my favourite kind and this definitely tops the list of those places. We got a space all to ourselves and thoroughly enjoyed the evening.

Most of the dishes we ordered were good except the Cottage Cheese Pizza which had zero flavour.

All in all, a lovely place for a tranquil dinner.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Food-3/5
They have average food taste. I do recommend the mushroom cream soup which was pretty awesome. We ordered Manchurian Sizzler which was average. The quantity was less.

Decor-2.5/5
Nothing great. Not well maintained. Although the restaurant is located in a quiet place, which is nice, they couldÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92ve worked on the appearance.

Staff-3/5
Average again. Not much to comment. They all look tired and no proper greeting.

Shourya3004')]

address: Level 5, 1 MG Mall, Swami Vivekananda Road, Trinity Circle, MG Road, Bangalore
name: CafÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂÃÂ© Felix
dish_liked: Burgers, Sandwiches, Peanut Butter Smoothie, Margherita Pizza, Ravioli, Cocktails, Salad
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's on the top floor of 1 mg road with a beautiful view of the city. The ambience is really nice and the place has a very chill vibe. The service is good. We couldn't get a corner seat but as soon as they got one free, they shifted us so that we could enjoy the view. We ordered Tandoori Chicken and Jerk Chicken Pizza which were both really nice."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  If you are planning on a general hangout with friends or special ones, this place is the best you can be.
I had tried the eggnog as it was specially served during Christmas and it was great.
The other dishes that I tried were the onion rings and cheesy fries.
I would recommend you to try out the main platters and their impressive cocktails.
Muled Wine and eggnog are one of their specialities.
But remember to stay handful when you visit there as it's a quite expensive restaurant. The only thing that bothered me was the service.
I would give a 4/5 considering all the above factors."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Loved the ambience spot on I should say
Especially the bar area and the entrance to start of with extremely poor service hardly two or three waiters around and all of them in their own world wasnÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t happy with the plating, the things they show on Facebook donÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t seem to correlate Overall average food not upto the mark
Please do improve your service and train your staff in a better way and the menu seems to overwhelm when you look at it
Some slight changes and youÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92re on track
Overall:3/5
Ambience:4/5'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I really loved the ambiance as sitting on the top and able to see the road, buildings, small lake infront on me.
We ordered one thin crust pizza, pink sauce pasta and virgin Mojito.
Nice staff
Enjoyed the lunch'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Had All American Chicken Burger and Mushroom Cheese Pizza
Food is very average.
3/5 overall for me considering it's not cheap too.
Yet I would give them 4/5 because their deserts are just amazing. We had Chocolate Ganache Pastry and Lemon Meringue.
The ambience is pretty nice and chill."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Cafe Felix is a happening place that has one of the best views in the CBD. Totally love the feel of the place, especially the sky deck which is perfect for parties or office lunches or get togethers.

The food and drinks live up to the expectations one would have from a cafe such as this. The shots are fun, do try. The desserts are decadently presented and taste delicious too - loved the apple and banoffee pies.

The only complain is that the service does get sloppy, especially when one is in a larger group. It's not easy on the pocket but worth the experience if one is in the mood to have a good time."), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  The place is very upscale and neat.

The decor and ambience is to die for.

The food however doesn't live up to the expectations. I ordered an avacado toast which felt stale . Artificial paste on bread

Bit expensive and not that great food. I would give it a pass"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One of the best places to dine in Bangalore. From the appetizers to the main course or the desserts everything is a delight to the palate.
I was pleasantly surprised by both the vegetarian and non vegetarian being equally delicious.
Ambience - 5/5
Taste - 5/5
Service - 4/5

Must Try - Red Velvet Cupcake; Baked Potato with Bacon Bits'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Located at one of the most happening place in Bangalore is a roof top restaurant cafe Felix, serves good food. Descent ambience with lake facing view. Dessert Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93Coorg honey walnut cakeÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 starter Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93Mac n cheese poppersÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 pasta Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93ArabiattaÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 cocktails Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x93smooth talker & cool bean (coffee based)Ã\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x94 are must try. However service was disappointing, expected better service especially during weekends, looks like they were short staffed to attend the table regularly. Overall nice place to visit.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  It's a nice place to hangout with family and friends....not much pocket friendly ..but at least try once if you are a food lover...
Ambience 4/5
Decent...they have a party place on up floor...
Service 3/5
May be I expect more...quite slow even not much busy and a standard restaurant...
Food 4/5
Ordered French fries and pepperoni pizza ...decent
Drinks 3/5
I ordered their in house cocktail rum diary as a rum.lover...it's a mixture of white rum and golf rum with fresh fig and mint...it didn't reach my expectations...full of ice and didn't get the flavour....may be I expect too much on this place..
Anyway try once ...for experience ...."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I happened to meet up some old friends for lunch in Cafe Felix this week. This place is housed in 1 MG Mall and theres a glass wall on one side of the restaurant, with a good view of the surrounding area. The seating was comfortable and staff was courteous and knew their jobs well.
We ordered for soups and juices along with some bites for starters. There were veg/n veg pizzas for main course and that was quite filling.
The hygiene level was v good and food was of decent quality.
The aircon seemed to be less cooling and it was a bit stuffy but the staff did not pay heed to our requests to check the settings.
All in all, it was worth one visit but I would not wish to opt for this restaurant if there would be other options on hand.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  We visited this place on a Sunday night during the say cheese festival. Beautiful presentation is one of their strong points. Loved their crispy potatoes. Caramelized cheese burst faggotini was heavenly, highly recommended.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I have been to this restaurant two weeks back and I had a great time visiting this restaurant. Had Granoula Bowl and Mixed Berry Smoothie. Enjoyed to the fullest. Kudos!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Location is a great plus point for Cafe Felix. The large windows make for sunset viewing an enjoyable experience. WeÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92ve always enjoyed their thin crust pizza and Pasta Bolognaise. Rich and full of taste. Our waiter helped us access the Wifi too and was very prompt and professional. We love coming back to Cafe Felix!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This place is located in 1 MG-Lido Mall. I visited this place with my Mom and we had to wait a little while to get a table as it was full. We got a table which had the view of Ulsoor lake which made it even more fun. We ordered Chikoo and Peach Shake and Pineapple Banana Slushie for drinks.   I landed here accidently. I was looking for some kind of food court in the mall and landed here instead. However I decided to give it a try..   Visited this place on a Saturday afternoon. Loved the fact that it overlooks Ulsoor lake and is such a pretty view that it a sight that I shall always remember.

Coming to food, we ordered their Cheese Truffle Fries, Mashed potatoes, Onion Rings, Chicken wings, Spaghetti with Prawns and the Chicken Teriyaki Salad.   The View of city from cafe felix is just awesome. Restaurant is on the top floor of 1 mg mall.

Ambiance wise its spectacular to spend time with your loved ones.
Coming to the food i was disappointed to see the lack of taste in all the items we ordered.

Hot Chocolate (with marshmallow): Disastrous ! I couldn't get the taste of Choclate itself. It tasted more like some water milk mixture.

Tandoori corn soup with curry leaves: The only item which was okay with not much of regrets.

Mushroom Pizza with mozzarella cheese: this thin crust pizza should come up with options of customization. Base was good and crispy however the toppings lacked seasonings. Just topping with cheese doesn't serve the purpose.

Pork Ribs: very chewy unlike melt in the mouth delight.

Staff members were polite but needed to be attentive also.

The pricing is way too high for the items of this taste.

Overall rating

Ambiance : 4/5
Food : 2/5
Service : 3/5
Value for money: 1/5"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED

  I was here at this cafe for celebrating my niece's birthday party.

I loved their food ...... starters and main course were awesome ...... however, what I couldn't forget was the desserts ...... So, make sure that you go here with a sweet tooth and don't miss the desserts. Forget all the calories for one day and enjoy the sweetness of life :)

  The spectacular view of the Ulsoor lake is absolutely stunning from Felix .

A unique specialty of their burgers with Bangalore which, has an extensive variety of burger choices making it difficult to choose a place to go snatch a burger, yet having a nibble at the burgers at Cafe Felix till date I don't need to search for another burger joint in the city . The burgers are measured splendidly and all the more importantly its deliberately layered enabling it to be reduced to the specific last chomp giving a general fulfilling experience, watch out for their all American burger ( A separate adventure altogether)"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This cafe has a super classy ambience. The staff and the service was on point too. I had ordered a peanut butter
Pie with coffee and my friends, fish and chips. I loved the dessert; topped with Reese peanut butter cups and was very well presented. My friends liked the their pick too. We had a very pleasant evening and would love to give them another visit.')]

address: 24/1, Lavelle Road, Bangalore
name: Glen's Bakehouse
dish_liked: Pizza, Coffee, Pasta, Tiramisu, Cheesecake, Hot Chocolate, Pie
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Glen's bakehouse- ask anyone who is living in Bangalore , "where we will get the best CUPCAKES and COFFEE?
They will recommend, and so I will, Glen's. Their red velvet cupcake took my heart and their signature coffee is so so good.
Recommend - 100/100. Must try if you're in Bangalore.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Glen's Bakehouse! Oh my love!
Red velvet cake is the first thing which comes to my mind when I hear the name Glen's bakehouse?.
Glen's=red velvet ?
Red velvet cakes are so perfect here ?.
Just ordered red velvet sundae which was 175/- and it is totally worth.
Must try!"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Lovely experience at Glen's! The mini red velvet cupcakes are extremely delicious, you cannot stop at one! ? The Pasta and Risotto was pretty tasty as well."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  What used to be Java City, my second home a little over a decade ago, GlenÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s Bakehouse on Lavelle Rd was the place for lunch today. I was nostalgic while entering the place, and hoped the new one would live up to expectations I had. And it did.

First off, a cozy ambiance despite several tables available. And I love the Jazz they play, it sets the mood right! I had a Turbo Tangerine drink to recovering from the intense sun outside. It helped. And then had the Pizza Primavera. Baby corn, Sun dried Tomatoes and Green olives on a thin crust base, quite nice. And for dessert, a piece of red velvet cake and a double espresso. Thumbs up for the cake of course.

I wanted to give 4 stars. What stopped me was the light eats section of the menu. Only 2 vegetarian options. Come on Glen, you can do better than that!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  4pm on a Saturday nothing in the tummy.. It was a time to explore, Zomato rating directed me to this place. Every bit this lives up to the rating. Ambience, buzzing with ppl of every kind. Had ordered, Lasagna and then Nutty ice-creamy both lived up to expectations - loved it totally !!

The service could have a tad better, repeatedly had to call for something .. hence -1 star.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  It has a outdoor seating as well as fine dining,outdoor dining is pleasing and beautiful compared to the indoor seating. The food tastes delicious and cupcakes are on the best.
Must try red velvet cupcakes puffs rolls croissants
& pastaÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Delicious food and worth the price!

Must try:
Barbecue chicken pizza (most liked)
Lasagna - chicken
POT roast chicken
Chicken roast sandwich

Must try Pastry :
Red velvet pastry

Must try beverage : lemon ice tea

Other beverages we tried were also good such as
Frappe, banana smoothie, blackcurrant smoothie.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Serves some of the best pastries in Bangalore, a huge fan of their cheese cake segment.
Red velvet and mango cheese cakes are a must.

Few recommendations
> Willy's classic hot chocolate along with cheese cake.
> Strawberry crunch
> Chicken lasagna and red pesto pasta"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Well, my real rating would be 3.75.
It's a nice place, with a great bakery section, we had a risotto, however having one recently that was a lot better, we noticed it could use improvements. It was alright, but nothing over the top! We next had a hot chocolate, which was absolutely yumza!
We ordered a blueberry cheesecake and had Heard that this was one of the better cheese cakes in town, the blueberry certainly proved so, but the cheese could definitely have more space in the cheesecake! Not disappointing, but not even overwhelmingly good. Again, a fairly good cheesecake is what we had.
We also took away a couple of macaroons and a red velvet cupcake with cream cheese frosting, which was scrumptious and tasted very good. Macaroons were close if not above average.
Cheers, worth a visit for sure."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  It never disappoints. I am a die hard fan of their red velvet but this time they gave me one more reason to love them. Their Belgium Chocolate Cheesecake \U0001f929
If you havenÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92t tried it yet, please do. ?'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Well...when it comes to red velvet cake or pastry there is no competition or replacement of Glen's Bakehouse.
This review is again focused on same, we were nearby this place and therefore planned to visit just for red velvet pastry...and like always enjoyed it to the very best.

definitely.. 5/5"), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Glen's!! Oh my!! Why are you sooo perfect Glen's? Red velvet cupcakes are the first thing that comes to my mind when I hear the name. Red velvet cupcakes be the best thing to have here and which should not be missed here.
Only set back here is the parking space. It's every tough to find a parking spot here.
Coming back to food. All cheese cakes and beverages are extremely good too. I've also tried veg Lasagna and fish fingers as well and their were too perfect too. Other than these, hot chocolate, specialist hot teas are a delight. Glen's is a whole packagage of perfection. Love for glens. Cheers team you guys are the best. Let me not forget to make a special cheer to the pastry chef. You are the best in bengaluru.
Ambience - 4. 5/5
Service - 4.5/5
Taste - 5/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I love this place for its food and desserts .
The ambience is good and calm
Service is good
I love their red velvet cheesecakes and cupcakes with cheese cream
ItÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s the best in Bangalore I feel
The creaminess and the sponge of the cake is unbeatable
Yummy
Rates are in the higher side'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  I was the got lunch here today and the quaint ambience off entering into a small verandah is so appealing. The food menu is good for quick bites !! I had the lamb hamburger which had a decent layer of pickles, poached egg and grilled Onions with some cabbage based dressing . Overall the party was nice and juicy but somehow the whole burger size proportion was a little off !! The bun could have been slightly bigger with the amount of in between stuff being put in. As a result eating it was an exercise . For me a good burger is something I can hold on hand and take a bit out of it without half the layers gaping off ! Also the other day I ordered in pastries from three store and they are as good as there other stores app no company's for the desserts section at all"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Good atmosphere, well lit, polite staff, freshly baked cheesy juicy pizzas, amazing shakes, mouthwatering pastas and the cupcakes and pasteries Are to die for.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED

address: 34/1-2, Meanee Avenue Tank Road, Sivanchetty Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
name: Skoolroom
dish_liked: Chocolate Overload, Burgers, Pasta, Peri Peri Chicken Pizza, Peri Peri Chicken Burger, Momos, Freak Shake
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Very nice ambience. Gives you a real back to school feel. Food is alright, not mind blowing. Worth a visit for sure. Whether it's the individual water bottles for every customer or the pencil box with cutlery, this place brings back good memories."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  It's a small food joint.complimentry popsicle was difinitely good idea.service was good. We ordered Hawaiian burger, special burger,club sandwich, skoolroom special prwan. There was no difference between both the burger. Patty was sloppy. Club sandwich was again not good. But prawn was really good. It's a coconut based dish."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Intended rating - 4.5
This school room themed cafe comes with the right amount of quirk to it. The theme is followed her to the t, which pencil cases holding the spoons and fork to a notebook serving as the menu, it's really cool.
Coming to the food, they have ice lollies you all! And some really cool mocktails.
Must try items there is definitely the skolroom special creamy prawns and their lipsmacking chicken burger. They also have good pizza, cheese loaded nachos and the must try freakshake - that not only lives up to its name buy is also very delicious. Warning : it took four of us to finish that shake ?
Overall a nice experience.
Taste 4.5/5
Ambience 4.5/5
Service 4/5
Value for money 4.5/5"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Skoolroom- Located in Ulsoor. Having a Classroom Ambience which will immediately catch your eyes.
Attractive decoration all over the cafe.

Ambience (5/5)

Service was good and quick and were nearly severed.

Service (5/5)

Coming to the food we had

Skoolroom Prawns (5/5)
Loaded Nachos (5/5)
Skoolroom basket (5/5)
Corn veg pizza (4/5)
Tandoori Burger (4/5)

Coming to shakes we had

Monster Freak Shake (5/5)

Overall good experience definitely try this restaurant to get the old school time memories back.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Another restaurant in the long list of Themed restaurants in Bangalore, reminds you of the school days. We visited this place on a Friday evening. Their speciality is a Monster Shake which has a cake, a donut, snickers and a few other things to make it look tempting and monstrous!

foodnwine.in'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  This place has a slightly odd location, and parking is quite tricky esp during traffic. Inside, itÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s school theme keeps tickling the nostalgia nerves. Themes have a first time appeal and then it could quickly appear boring.
Food is good, drinks options are standard. Overall a one time visit.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Rating out of 5 stars
Food Taste - 4.2
Really enjoyed the food because of the whole nostalgia aspect of it.
What you should not miss is the Wai Wai noodles, double chocolate milkshake and skoolroom prawns.
I did notice alot of pan asian options which I must say taste really good.
Zomato Gold - 1+1 on Food - 5 star for that
Pricing - 4.1 - Decent pricing not heavy on the pockets
Ambience- 4.4 loved the games and decor that goes really well with the theme.
Parking- Available
Overall - 4.4 will go back again!'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I visited this place two times with my husband. This is a small decent cafe to hangout with family n children. Whole cafe theme is based on school. Served culinary set in pencil box, free orange candies, menu as a school diary/copy, etc. I live their crispy chilli veggies but quiet oily. We utilized 1+1 offer here. They also have games for passing time with kids n friends. We also tried their peri-peri chicken n paneer tikka burger which were not great. But yeah one person cannot eat the whole burger.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The place, stands true to its name and does remind you of your school days, more so if you were born in the 90s. Spoons and forks we're kept in a geometry box and everyone had an individual school type water bottle, and Tom and Jerry was being played on the TV screen. So the decor is beautiful. Food was good. the fiery chicken burger was excellent, veg aloo tikki burger was fine, .Mac and cheese was decent, not great. Mushroom Manchurian was good, lil too salty though. Coffee and shakes could have been really better. That was the only disappointing factor. Staff was polite"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  The place has a decent ambiance and the concept is nice.. I liked the way they were serving food. However the piri piri burger i had ordered had undercooked chicken.. That was a big turn off. Might visit again.. But won't be trying the burger..."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Welcomed with ice lollies and greeted with all things schoolish, this cafe deserves a visit due to its very well planned theme. The food is decent and priced quite reasonably. The service is quite slow and ineffecient, that being the only downside. Would make for a great visit with kids or friends. It is also halaal friendly.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED

P.S - Enjoy 1+1 on food with Zomato Gold.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  They have this quirky little classroom themed place, with school boards and desks. The chairs are benches and you can find your cutlery in a pencil box! Cute right? As the menu is handed out to you in a brown covered notebook, nostalgia hits you!
And the best part is! They have Tom Jerry tuned in on the TV. We ordered the steamed chicken momos, a perfect bite sized portion with chilii sauce. The peri peri chicken burger looked so colorful!! Slightly sloppy but the taste was good.
The berry blue soda to drain it all down. Don't be shy to take your date here, you can really bring out the child in them :P"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED

  Soft and super light buns!! That was the biggest standout for me. The burgers had soft and super light buns. The same applies to the pizza, and it had nothing to do with the fact that it was a thin crust pizza. It felt like a no crust pizza!! It did not feel heavy at all. Did not leave you feeling too full or lethargic or sluggish. It left you feeling sated.

A definite must try. The place has a gimmick, no denying that. The gimmick lasts about 30-45 minuets and thatÃ\x83Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x83Ã\x82Ã\x82Ã\x92s perfect cause that how long it takes you to make up your mind, place the order, the kitchen to prepare your food and bring it to your table.

address: 24, Church Street, Bangalore
name: eat.fit
dish_liked: Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Not a wide range of choice.. but whatever they have it's well made. Rajma and salad is amazing..
Subz that I ordered wasn't too good luck subway may be because of non sauce but tasted well thou not great..
The super food they give in a little box is wow..

When think so much about health think a bit on being go green too.. those little boxes of plastic seems waste.. pls serve it in non plastic.."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Definitely maintains the quality and healthiness even in home deliveries. Excellent packing. The quantity of food was a little lesser than what I'm used to for the price but it was still worth it. Good food overall."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  This place offers exactly what they promise. Healthy food with taste and proper clean ambience.

Try their parantha meal. It's tasty. And don't forget to have their yummy laddoo which they call superfood of the day and is free with every order.

We also had dry fruit pudding. It was not that tasty but still won't leave you disappointed.

Their noodle bowl with tofu was yummy.

We tried meal of the day which was rice bowl. That was brown rice with rajma. It was healthy and tasty as well.

Their sub was also good.

Do visit this place if you are in a mood of having a healthy light dinner."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I liked the ghar ka rajma - brown rice and egg curry - brown rice served here . The food is really nutritious and healthy . Calorie conscious and fitness addicts will love the variety of food served here.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Being foodie and fitness guy i always wanted to visit this place from days , yes finally i visited ! Wanted to try something more than 300cal but i found this fruit bowl of 319cal which met my requirement ! Very tasty as i always felt fit meals are hard to eat , but here it?s not.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Good, clean, affordable, healthy food option on Church Street. I don't quite like their Parantha + aloo subzi food option. I quite like to the small sweet they provide at the end of the meal. I'd like a menu with more options."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  eat.fit has been one of my most favorite places to order food from, in the last few months. Now, they also have a store on Church Street, the first ever eat.fit outlet in Bengaluru.

The store is very easy to locate and has quite a modern ambience. They serve their usual healthy take on popular indian dishes, and also some quick handy eatables. You can choose from dishes like Biryani, Roti Plate, Paratha Plate, Healthy Subs, Rice Bowl or you can choose to create your own meal. You get to choose between Whole Wheat Roti/Paratha/Brown Rice and then 2 sides of your choice for ?190! The food was extremely fresh and served hot.

They also serve a 'meal of the day' which is priced at around 100-150 depending on if it's veg/non-veg. You'll also find their range of oatmeal bowls, fruit bowls, cold pressed juices and snacks!

Overall, definitely a great option to dineout and yet stick to healthy eating."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Healthy food is starting to taste good too. Its encouraging to see more outlets join the healthy food bandwagon. It just means more options for us. Eat fit has thus typical fast food set up at church street but serves superb tasting quick meals that are ready to carry away and eat at your convenience. There is a large variety for vegetarians and non-vegetarians as well. The best part is the large variety in healthy drinks as well.

Good job guys.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  A nice place, conveniently located on beautiful Church Street. Though nothing is marked vegan yet, there were quite a few veganisable options.

The people were very friendly and helpful. They made recommendations and also swapped out ingredients to ensure our meal was completely plant based.

We were also told they?re working on a special vegan menu that?ll start being available at all their locations. I?m very excited to try that! ?

We tasted a bunch of things, all were good, but I have to make a special mention of the pure juices and the whole wheat bread used in the sub. Those two were my favourite. I really liked the sweet flax seed cracker samples they served as their Superfood of the Day.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Totally love the concept of eating healthy and not compromising on the taste!! They have really good stuff for veggies and non veggies . Personally love their chocolate brownie!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  My first experience in curefit
#eatfit #healthyfood #protien #carbs #cleaneating
#location #service #friendly
Ambience ?
Service ?
Food ?
Interiors ?
Approach was very friendly, they took that time to explain about the services and guiding us to the counter in between the heavy rush hour, I highly appreciate that. Don?t mind going regularly there. The atmosphere was all positive ?Masha Allah?')]

address: 765, 1st Floor, 1st Main, Domlur Layout, Domlur, Bangalore
name: Kerala Pavilion
dish_liked: Fish Curry, Roast Chicken, Kerala Parotta, Appam, Mutton Pepper Fry, Sea Food, Ghee Rice
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The food here is really good. I loved everything I ordered.

? Pricing is great.

? Parking is available in nearby areas.

? Don't go by the looks of the restaurant. Food is amazing, if you love Kerala Cuisine.

? Ordered : Kappa & King Fish Curry (1 each), Appam (4) & Chicken Stew, Kerala Parotha (2).
Bill amount Rs 490/-.

?Food : 4.5/5
Ambience : 3/5
Service : 4/5
Hygiene : 3/5
Staff behaviour : 5/5"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  We ordered the butter chicken and boneless pepper chicken, both tasted awesome and was cooked in Kerala style. This place offers great value for money for those who like non-veg Kerala cuisine.

althingsbeautiful.wordpress.com'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Ordered kappa with fish curry and kerala Paratha.
Food was delicious. Spicy fish curry is something to die for. Paratha was soft and tasty.
Thanks for the good food..'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  Fish meals 168 looks price worthy but not good quality and nor the quantity you can check the photo. Place was clean enough as per the local daily eatouts. But can be improved on cleaning part. Service was quick with a smile but fried fish was totally cold and rasam was cold as well. But served some hot rasam served on request.

I have tasted so many Malayali yummy delicacies like avial and porial that may be the reason I didn't liked their veg servings on banana leaf. They need to improve on that. Fish gravy and rasam was good. But in sambar got 5 vegetable pieces out of that 4 was potato chunks. Scope of improvement is there will visit again to try out their Kerala paratha and fish pepper fry.
Bon Appetit Chef BB

chefbb.in"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Took a packed dinner from this place. Food was excellent Kerala paratha and tomato curry was really awesome. Mutton pepper fry and chicken masala were also too good . 

Great value for money !'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I had a Kerala pavilion day. For breakfast I had masala dosa. The chutney was a little spicy for me but I liked the stuffing and the fact that the dosa didn't have oil. For lunch o had the chicken curry and Kerala paratha. The chicken was tasty. Value for money and the staff is very courteous."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great food always. This is my go to place whenever I need a kerala fix. The staff is very courteous too! Appam, stew and a lemon tea in the morning is a great start to the day.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Food is good but was served cold. Seating on the 1st floor is fairly decent for families. Tried the fish meals and was quite satisfied. tucked in a by lane in Domlur layout.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  ???? Food
???? Value for Money
?‍???‍???‍???‍???‍?? Delivery

?Tried Boneless Pepper Chicken, Neychoru Kozhi Mulakittathu & Chicken Biryani.

?Boneless Pepper Chicken - Boneless pieces of chicken deep fried with loads of onions, green chillies, red chillies, garlic, black pepper & spices. Super spicy & tasty dish. Must try!!!
?Neychoru Kozhi Mulakittathu - Ghee rice served with a spicy chicken curry. Ghee rice was cooked perfectly with fried onions & whole spices. Kozhi Mulakittathu is an authentic Kerala style spicy chicken curry. The curry was super spicy & pairs perfectly with the ghee rice.
?Chicken Biryani - A Kerala style biryani, perfectly cooked with right amount of spices.

?Highly recommended!!!
?Must try!!!')]

address: 8/ 9, 17th F Cross, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bengaluru
name: Donne Biriyani House
dish_liked: Pepper Chicken, Chicken Biryani, Mutton Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This review is based on the take away.
This is one of the few places that serve biryani with decent quantity for a reasonable price. My go to place for biryani cravings. Although I feel its more like pulav rather than biryani, I love the taste.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ambience - Had visited this place long time back and it wasn't clean at all so had left without having any food. Today one of my friends who was in town wanted to have donne biryani so we checked this place (as its very close by) and now the place seems lot more cleaner and is manageable (even though there is scope for so many improvements). Service - when they served biryani I noticed the meat was cold so when we enquired they took it away and served us with hot one. Coming to the food - biryani was tasty and it looked beautiful, portions were fairly large."), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  The cost was effective, thanks to the offer. The chicken dry had too much of masala. The quantity of rice was less and when ordered for a family pack I had expected a family pack and not individual boxes.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I've tried their Biryanis for sometime now and yesterday had the chicken biryani. Although the taste is slightly better than a few other joints falling in the same price category, the quantity was quite less. At times it is fulfilling but most of the times its not. I wouldn't recommend this to those who expect good amount to be served. It's very reasonable but that quantity is just not satisfying.

Overall, a decent place but not too much on offer here."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I had ordered Donne biriyani combo...This was the first time I was having Donne biriyani.I am very specific when it comes to the taste of the biriyani.The biriyani they prepare Is really damn good.The combo is sufficient for a one person. Worth paying for the food. Very happy with the taste of biriyani and highly recommend this restaurant.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Awesome taste! This is the first time I am trying Donne biriyani and this was the only place in my area having a good rating and reviews. But this place was not available to me via swiggy or Zomato and hence I ordered successfully through dunzo. The portion size was perfect for one person. Ordered chicken Donne biriyani and chicken kebab and both were delicious. I am very fussy when it comes to biriyani and I am quite partial to Malabar biriyani. But finally I found another style of biriyani I can embrace!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  One of the best Donne biriyani house in Bangalore. Great service and loved the biriyani there! Would recommend everybody to try it out for authentic biriyanis in Bangalore! Loved the experience.')]

reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Well located in the office area of central Bangalore, certainly a getaway from office stress for some hrs and get a good and tasty meal with various cuisines. I tried the spicy chicken meal and it was worth the price. Just a bit expensive than all other burgers joints but certainly provide a nice quality meal. Recommended if you're at St Mark's road looking for some quick meal before you resume your office work. Also they have branches all over Bangalore."), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Leon Grill has one of the finest nachos in the town. I'm vegan but according to my friend's this place serves yhe best chicken. The ambience and the location of the place is perfect. Management is polite and they always serves with a smile :)"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Fresh and yummy food..Must try wraps,it's really nice and more than enough for one person.Good options for veg and non veg.Price are reasonable"), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I love the rolls from this place. The place is little but very well kept. The service is great and the food is yummy! Their rice platters are equally amazing. I tried Peri Peri chicken rice platter, veg falafel platter, popcorn chicken, chicken wings and chicken tikka roll. A great place for weekend lunch when you are craving something yummy and chicken!'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Ordered ' cheesy peri peri chicken rice bowl '. The rice and chicken portions were really good. Tasted good as well ( it was very spicy ) Got a very good deal with zomato promo code."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  When leon grill started first in Indiranagar my house was right next to it. My noon lunch was from here.love thier ? which is super delicious and worth every single penny. But wanted to try carolina chicken burger - yeah right name sounds fancy and it is tasty than expected. I can never get bored of donors and peri peri wings ?

diviaramesh.com'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I ordered via UberEats. Super impressed with the food. I tried their Falafel Doner Wrap and Pizza strips which was delicious. The wrap was quite filling.
Will definitely be ordering again.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Leon grill is yet another place to hog when you are craving burgers. They offer burgers, rolls with meals. The paneer burger was really good. The nachos were cheesy and delicious. The peri peri chicken roll was yummy but super spicy. Overall it is a good place with reasonable prices.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Ambience 7/10
Food 9/10
Service 8/10

A small outlet in the middle of St marks road situated opposite naturals ice cream is a great place to grad a quick bite at an amazing price.
For anyone who likes chicken and something spicy this is a place you must try. The quantity and quality of both of the food is amazing and if amazing if you need a quick meal on a business day and need to head back to work.
The service is fast but sometime can take a couple minutes due to the lunch rush at the restaurant but I'm sure it will be worth the wait.

I rate this 8/10"), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Really great piri piri fries. The burgers and donner wraps are really yummy, but the chicken is really oily and heavy. The plate had lots of oil on it as well.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  JUICY CHICKEN ?
I'd gone to St Marks on a weekend, so obviously there was a wait list in most of the places, when I eyed this place.
The Ambience is good
Being an outlet for one of the franchise, I didn't expect the food to be that great. But the Chicken was so SOFT and TENDER. I loved how juicy it was.
The combos on the menu is at a very affordable rate."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  When you are hungry whatever comes in your eyes just feel to grab it. reviews_list:

  Well there's nothing great to say about this place.
But would never recommend anyone. Quantity is less plus quality is like not even worth a rupee.

That was my first and last order from this place.
Attaching bill to compare the quantity with the bill amount. I had to order raita since raita is a main part of biryani and included in bill but never delivered. I had to order Bhutani Raita since I knew they won't be giving raita as part of biryani.

Note: Please increase the quality and quantity of your food. Please don't make us judge you on these silly stuffs."), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED

Decent food for decent price.
Really worth the price.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Very pocket friendly. Ordered sandwich and fresh juice. Delivery was quiet quick and food did not disappoint my taste buds. Would go tp this place foe quick snacks or bites.')]

address: Next to CMH Metro Station, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
name: Burger King
dish_liked: Burgers, Tandoori Grill Burger, Mango Shake, Cheesy Fries, Whopper Burger, Chicken Keema Burger, Chicken Crisp Burger
reviews_list:
[('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Burger King - really got excited to try out this fast food centre when they newly opened, Food as usual burger fries and coke - decent enough to try for once in a while.
Ambience: 4/5Taste: 3/5service: 3.5/5Value for the money: 2 5/5'), ('Rated 1.0', "RATED
  I normally have ok experience from this restaurant. Sometimes, they send badly assembled burger and sometimes- cold fries. But, today, they achieved even superior level. They served stale food. They charged me for the entire Fiery Chicken Combo and didn't send the Coke. It's not even weekend and you can't even complete simple order & serve proper food? Honestly? you call this a patty? It was rock hard, double fried, very stale patty. You serve stale food for 260 rupees..let me ask you - How do you sleep at night?

Absolutely disgusting experience. Not going to order from here ever again and going to tell as many people I can - not to."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  No doubt their burgers pocket friendly when compared to macd and kfc and it?s god at taste also. But this time had French fries ? and fried chicken wings.
? chicken wings for a piece of four cost around 130 it was spicy and tasted good. Cost of French fries 80/- which wasn?t not crispy and fresh too felt like it was old stock.

Service 3/5
Taste 3/5
Ambience 4/5
Cleanliness 3.5/5
Price -pocket friendly'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Burger King whoppers are no doubt delicious. The cheesy fries were so yummy. The experience of this particular outlet in overall a good one. It has one advantage of just next to Indiranagar metro station.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Very pocket friendly, it is absolutely worth the money.. The burgers are really good, I also tried the ice cream which was really nice......'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  Just an another money making food joint...their food does not excite me... Would be one of the last places I visit again... When they arrived in India I hoped they would serve good beef burgers but even they gave in to our stupid audience I guess...'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  This is the place that I had my first Burger King burger. That taste has not gone from my tounge, the stuffing and the way it was prepared. I compare that first Burger with all the other time I had at different burger Kings. In between I had visited this floor after I changed my house and the taste was not that up to the mark, but it was better than other places. I am giving this star only for the first experience that I had with this branch. Kudos and hats off to the staff')]

address: 6th Cross Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
name: Shanmukha
dish_liked: Fish, Chicken Curry, Paneer Biryani, Baby Corn Masala
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Prawns special biryani was found none apart from the shanmukha.

It is very very near to my place and so I get all my food on time with nice packaging and hot food. The prawns were also fresh and tasty.'), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  Ordered Chicken Biryani From Shanmukha yesterday and it was nothing but red chilli paste with some rice and chicken. Tried calling them so many times but the number was not reachable and had such a pathetic experience after waiting for so so long I had to sleep hungry because none of the other chains were open by that time and this thing was so fired up that I was not able to put even a spoon of biryani inside. Horrible'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Well one more outlet of Shanmukha.This place has never made me regret irrespective of the mood for taste. Well the menu is same as the other outlets . Good thing is that they accept delivery little late as well and covers a good range of places .As Old Airport road is a good connecting point.
Flavoured long grained basanti rice and a combination of a indo chinese spicy soft chicken .
Their special Biriyani. Never fails.
However what I felt that that the quantity can be increased a bit so that it can be shared among 2 ..
For 1 is just sufficient


yourgenie.co.in'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  I have tried home delivery. Got 50 % discount too, food came on time. Tate was very good quantity was decent too. Chicken pieces were boneless. Overall good experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Having been one of the best Biriyani place I've had in Bangalore, we ordered a 2 large chicken biriyani and an Apollo fish fry. Once gain the biriyani did not disappoint and the fish was good as well. Though the quantity of the rice was on a lesser side (comparing to the price) the taste scores a point above this."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  zomato delivered food on time and fresh. biryani is good but gravy quantity less compared to rice. kabab and lollypop were ok ok. there are other places which provide better'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Very nice place. The food has improved a lot . Felt it is far better from previous time .. The breads were very soft , butter chicken tasted exactly like the authentic preparation , with a flavour of a burnt and sweet taste.. Lovely. Biriyani was very tasty , the flavour was very rich .
Overall the order came very quickly...'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great place if you are looking for some desi meals at great prices . The delivery is look . Portion is sufficient for 1 person . Taste is awesome . Will suggest if some Innovative packing can be think of.. The best thing nos the super combination of sweetness and spices in their meal
.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Well one more time mesmerized by their Biriyani.So called Shaanmukha special Biriyani. Good in quantity and and if you are little favourable for chicken pieces you will love to have small tender and properly spice laid boneless chicken pieces.. will make you feel your meal is complete. A complete satisfaction meal . Strongly recommend this place ...'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  Superb Biriyani as you get in all other outlets ..
Great .. The delivery took a bit time , as it was raining bit the food was tightly packed and was completely hot .

The Biriyani was super tasty with the spice combinations, flavoured rice . Lip Smacking.
Don't know if Iam wrong but I felt that the Biriyani quantity is comparatively less as compared when you are dining at the outlet.
However the food taste is all what you want"), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Well when you are in back in Bangalore you know what you miss the most . The various pubs and restaurants. And when you talk about food , then how come you miss Shaanmukha . New outlet where you can get home delivery. Same taste and flavour . Very well and richly made . The accompaniment was a bit dissapointing as it is changed now . But who cares about the accompaniment when there is Biriyani on your players. Lovely food and they are consistent with their food all across outlets.. Thanks'), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  I ordered bhiriyani... Rice is not cooked properly... Chunk has all bones ... Better not order food from this restaurant.... I strongly recommend not to order.. it's not worth of 60 also"), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Ordered two nos of Special Boneless Chicken Biryani for lunch. Didn't quite like it as it was extremely spicy and red coloured. The Meghna style boneless, red thick gravied chicken pieces tasted somewhat like Chicken Tikka. The good thing about this Biryani is the huge portion size (almost 1 litre) that might delight those who look for quantity.

Also, the Salan and Raitha are packed in opaque silver coloured covers and one can't tell what's in it without cutting it open. Request to pack them in transparent containers or covers."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  It?s a monsoon treat in Bangalore that Shanmukha Has opened in Old Airport Road and the delivery limit is also very far . Same taste and even same price . The best thing is that You get 100 INR discount on Zomato , that is like just unbelievably great .. It?s a great gift from Shanmukha for all the foodies ...
Only suggest is that if you can make the parcel box more attractive and unique , that will be great ..
All the best ....'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ordered their veg biryani through Zomato. Since it was there in combos offer, it was available in 100 bucks. It was delivered fresh and hot. The packaging was really good. I had never seen salan and raita packed in separate containers. The portion was sufficient for a single person. The biryani tasted really good but could have been better if it was a bit less spicier. Even the raita and salan had a great taste. Overall, it was a good experience.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  They serve a really good biryani ! We ordered the prawns biryani and chicken shanmukha special curry. Both the dishes arrived with good quality takeaway pack which is rare these days. The quantity was quite good with no compromise on quality.

I would give 5 stars if you guys include mutton biryani as well.

Hope your food quality does not change in.the coming months. Looking forward for the next order !'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Biryani is a bit too bland and salan lacks heat. But everything is perfectly cooked and the portions are large enough. Winning combination if they get the flavors right.')]

address: Mota Royal Arcade, Brigade Road, Bangalore
name: Dunkin' Donuts
dish_liked: Burgers, Coffee, Chocolate Donut, Bagel, Chocolate Drink, Dunkaccinos, Hot Chocolate
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  We had been here on Christmas and it was quite late. Even though most of the doughnuts were not there, we settled for a box of three.. We had also ordered hazelnut shake and lemon iced tea.. it's a great place to sit down and talk. Looking forward to visiting this place more to try out their other doughnut varieties."), ('Rated 2.0', "RATED
  I was here yesterday with my friends and i tried Black coffee.It wasn't soo good as expected.Its actually a strong stuff otherwise it's fine."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Dunkin doughnuts always has reasonable price and amazing offers for doughnuts. My favourite doughnut at dunkin is the cookie cart wheel .
Best place to be to havr doughnuts. Winter is coming and the coffee at dunkin is my most favourite coffee go here almost every day duting winter to have coffee and doughnuts. They have amazing offers to buy a pack of doughnuts.
Ambience is really cute and cosy. Service is good and fast .
Food - 5/5
Ambience- 5/5
Service- 5/5'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Definitely one of the best donuts in town! Worth every penny.

Totally love their flavours, especially the ones with chocolate filling.

The only disappointment was their chocolate milkshake and cappuccino. It wasn't that great.

Over all, it's a nice place to hang out with friends over some donuts."), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  I just like DD because of Naughty Lucy Burger else I really don't like donuts because if they serve hot burgers that taste way better than cold one what they serve all the time. Good place to hangout for a while. Interior is nice and they have one history wall of DD which is quite interesting."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Definitely the best donuts in town amongst the big international leagues. I once upon a time loved their burgers a lot more than donuts, they are still good but not great. Service has been a mixed bag consistently (hence the 3 stars).

My recommendations - 

Burgers - 
Naughty Lucy burgers
Heaven can wait chicken burger

Donuts -
Death by chocolate
Alive by chocolate
Break-up party eclair'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  If you love donuts...try here..
Great service.....good ambience....amazing taste...
There's nothing to say more...
Go and feel the vibe....
Fill your hunger..."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  The place is just a short walk from the metro .The food is really good and the service fairly quick. The donuts here are just AMAZING. Definitely worth the price. Decor is cute and fun!.All in all, a cute place for a date to just keep talking and having a good time enjoying the company.Not as sweet/sugary as other brands (which is good for calorie conscious).As for price, it's expected to be be expensive here, so can't really blame them."), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  It was on my Bookmark for a very long time, and it was totally worth it. They have varieties of Donuts, me and my friend had one box of six different flavors. And the Best was Death by chocolate. All and all very good place to hangout, planing to visit again.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Donuts for life !!!
#DD4life
Fresh ...warm...soft...donuts ...rich flavours...rich chocolate!!!
Perfectly balanced in taste in each and very single donut!!!
Its a treat !
Soft little cushion of love !')]

reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great option for non veg lovers. Value for money. Good rolls available.. would highly recommend the Chicken peri peri roll, chicken garlic chilli roll..'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Tried Chicken tikka double roll, Malawi roll, egg double and chicken tikka, taste was good specially my daughter enjoyed the tikka, wish they would served mint chutney with the kebabs and rolls would have been nice'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  If you are craving for chicken rolls in Bangalore don't miss this place. They serve the best rolls in Bangalore. A must visit place.

I will go with 4/5"), ('Rated 1.0', 'RATED
  I ordered food from here on a Friday night and placed an order for veg and non veg food. The paneer makhani which was supposed to have paneer makhani gravy, 2 rumali rotis and a veg starter came with just one rumali roti and no starter. To top it all we found a chicken piece in the gravy. Upon contacting the restaurant they said they will send us the order again but we just could not eat veg food from here anymore.
I understand that this is predominantly a non vegetarian place but if they cannot maintain the difference then the option of veg food should be completely removed from the menu. I am still waiting for the refund for the order which was promised over the phone call.'), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Loved the CHICKEN MURGH MALAI KABAB ROLL. the chicken was soft, juicy and tender.. and well it was as good as I'd expected it to be. This review writing feels like writing a 15 marks question in exams though. It doesn't get uploaded if you don't fill it with unnecessary rambling. I guess it can get uploaded now! ?"), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Just visited Khan Saheb Indiranagar outlet to try  their kebabs .I ordered a mutton boti and chicken seekh kebab. Chicken kebab was nice and Mutton boti was also good and tender .I have tried there rolls in past its tastes good. Good place to have quick bite or take away. 
This place doesn't have any dining space.")]

dish_liked: Chocolate Truffle Cake, Eggless Cake, Cup Cake, Chocolate Dreamcake, Photo Cake, Fruit Cake, Litchi Cake
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  My husband ordered image cake from this place and surprisingly it came so perfect and most importantly we did not have to compromise with the taste ..it was death by choclate...I would recommend this place if you are planning for image cake'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ordered chocolate truffle cake for one of my friends in bengalore.
The delivery was on time and the cake was delicious and just apt sweet. Not too much.. not too less..'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  I always had an eye for this place. Finally I ordered some red velvet slice of heaven. The packaging as you can see is pretty impressive. The cake was fresh and yummy.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Ordered some cupcakes from the place. By the looks of it it it really looked great but when i dived deep into it, it was dry and disappointing. The flavors was just okish and did not impress much.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  After reading good reviews about the place, I went ahead and ordered the flavoured cupcakes from here. Delivery was on time, packaging neatly done.
But alas! I wish I could say the same about the cupcakes.
Tried red velvet and chocolate flavour. Mini sized... utterly lacked moisture....dry and crumbly.. chocolate frosting was sticky on tongue. Which means the cupcakes were not fresh.Totally disappointed on being served such sub par product.'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Tried their chocolate lava cake via Zomato online ordering.
Great value for money. Around 125 bucks for a couple of lava cakes. The cakes are baked well with the gooey lava centre. Loved it.
Taste : 4/5
VFM : 4.5/5
Service : 4/5 (packaging and delivery)'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Ordered cake jars pinapple and chocolate
Pinapple had granules of groundnut/peanuts n very well layered and presentation was nice, A little extra sweet to the tongue but jar looked very nice and guess it had some jelly too

Chocolate was layered well too with vanilla n just perfect to the tongue'), ('Rated 4.0', 'RATED
  Had ordered for a chocolate truffle cake, zomato delivery was right on time. Their cake was really good and tasty. Packaging was good overall a good experience. So if anyone out there needs to order cake in emergency this is the go to place, next time will try for their pastries.')]

address: Shop 6, First Floor, Binnamangala First Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
name: Firangi Bake
dish_liked: Lasagne
reviews_list:
[('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  Named aptly, what comes out of this kitchen is truly Firangi:

BOMBAY QUESADILLA:

The filling was a mashed potato prepared in Indian essential spices It was generously stuffed between a chunky Paratha lined with sauces and jewelled with olives. Cut into two huge pieces, packed with the punch of flavours, A good Indian take on the classic Quesadilla.

LASAGNA:

One word that comes to mind when thinking of Lasagna is greasy, and this was just the same. Coming to the taste, the lasagna was one of the best ones we've ever had. Cheesey, tangy and filled with veggies which is how we love. Everything about it tasted so good that we craved for more."), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I had Bombay veg Quesadillas which were soft and perfectly cooked. I liked the spicy twist they added which they compared to taste and essence Bombay streets and thus the name. One should try them for sure. We also tried veg Mac n cheese which was also good and perfectly baked one. It was loaded with extra cheese and vegetables and it has a good quantity also. There are options available for both veg and non-veg.'), ('Rated 3.0', "RATED
  Taste - 3/5
Packaging - 2.5/5

I was disappointed when I opened the packing that I received from the Firangi bake. I've ordered from here before but never seen the packaging like this.
But the taste was different too.
It was completely different from last time and the Veg Mac and Cheese is nothing like Mac cheese and sorry, but it wasn't good.
The quesadilla however was okay, but not as good as what I've had from the other branches.
I hope the packaging and presentation of the food is changed."), ('Rated 4.0', "RATED
  This was the first time I ordered from this place. They are famous for it's Mexican and Italian cuisine and I wanted to try few things.
Ordered Butter Chicken Mac and Cheese and Tuscany Meatball Lasagne.
The Lasagna had perfect tangy yet cheesy taste and it was stuffed with lots of veggies, which was just mouth watering. The top layer was nicely crisp and it had lots of meat pieces.
It's a definite try for all the meat lovers."), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Through the zomato review program I tasted firangi bake products. I ordered the masala chicken quesadilla and minced chicken lasagna. I was amazed by the combination of the Indian stuffing with the Italian dishes. The quesadilla was had a large portion. Even the lasagna was good for 2 people. Overall it was a good experience.'), ('Rated 3.0', 'RATED
  Was asked to write a review for this, and ordered masala chicken quesadilla and chicken lasagne

Pros:

- prompt delivery

- hot food, proper packing

- crunchy quesadilla

- spicy kulcha bits and cheese in lasagna

Cons:

- price to Quantity ratio is not good

- too much sauce overpowered the taste of chicken in lasagne

Definitely worth a try, though possibly can try other items.'), ('Rated 2.0', 'RATED
  I had ordered the roasted veggie pot rice. I got a very well seasoned rice with some bread on the side. However the quantity is too less for the price they are charging. Not enough for one person. Also the bread needed some condiment on the side like a dip of some sort.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  I ordered my lunch from Firangi Bake today and loved the food & their superfast service. I recieved my order in just 25 minutes, really hot and fresh. I ordered Bombay Masala Quesadilla and. Roasted Veggies Pot Rice. Bombay Masala Quesadilla was so flavourful having a delicious mix of bhaji stuffed inside a crispy parantha. Roasted Veggies Pot Rice was baked with loads of cheese giving it a really yummy taste.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Firanki Bake, as their motto says - Global Bakes, Desi Twist is actually standing on it. Their menu has so many things which is globally loved food but they serve with the Indian fusion however.
I tried them for the first time and ordered Lasagne + Mac n Cheese, both were so cheesy.
Firstly, the packing they deliver to you in, is extremely beautiful and keep the food warm. Lasagne was good with a lot of fillings inside and Mac N Cheese will be your favourite if you are real cheese lover. These Desi twists are so love to have. Will try other items again soon :)'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Firangi bake is an outlet serving various varieties of fusion food items in veg or non veg.
I tried their tangy chole Quesadilla and Tandoori kukkad pot Rice.
Quesadilla were tooo good. They were filled with tangy chole with crisp veggies on top. Must try!!
Tandoori kukkad pot rice was really interesting with cheese on top and beneath was rice along with tandoori chicken. It was quite spicy and tatsed really good.

The food was delivered on time and it was freshly prepared as well.
Definitely a must try delivery outlet!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Firangi bake it is a well known place for itss wonderfull dishes
Firstly i thanks to zomato online food ordering app which provide me so supper fast dilivery that was just 15mins
I love to eat new dishes as FIRANGI BAKE IS A Place where i get many new dishes
I ordered bombay masala quesadilla that was really very amazing and crispy?
And i also ordered pimento lasagna which was very chizzy and delecious
I would love to order again')]

address: 10th Main, Vasanth Nagar, Bangalore
name: Behrouz Biryani
dish_liked: Raita, Gosht Dum Biryani, Dum Ghost Biryani, Paneer Biryani
reviews_list:
[('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Great food as always and giving an ultimate taste of Rice with full of spices and ravishing flavours from round the world, the biryani was way above the mark of fabulous.

Chicken Biryani was heart winning and had good size of chicken pieces in them.

The Gulab Jamun is yet another dish to must have for. This will complete your biryani meal.

Also not to forget, to try Phirni if you still got some space in your tummy.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  What is perfection? Perfection is bringing an age old classic to your doorstep. Perfection is making sure everyone gets to try a dish so legendary, that a vegetarian one had to be created JUST for the sake of it. Perfection is Behrouz Biryani!

I ordered their Falaffel Biryani, it came piping hot with a serving of Gulab Jamun and Raita. Brilliant! I cannot wait to try other variants they have to offer.

Good stuff!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  This outlet truly proves that Biryani is love!?
Their packaging is literally very nice...you will surely love it!
Also, their delivery was so on time and the delivery boy was so humble and polite!
Their biryani is also very tasty!
I had the paneer Burj Biryani... quantity was good enough...they give gulab jamun and raita as well with the order!
Every thing was tasty!
Must try this outlet to have literally Yummy biryani!
Highly recommended!'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Tried the newest murgh biryani it was damn delicious and the packaging was just so wow. They gave perfect meal with dessert. And the quantity was quite tummy filling. The chicken pieces were adequate. Keep it up behrouz! I am seeking to order more biryani totally loved having it! Thumbs up ??'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Simply loved their Biryani .... I ordered Their Lazeez gosht dum Biryani when was in Bangalore last week. It had this authentic flavors to it.... Chicken was very well cooked and you can taste different flavors. You can taste different flavors in the different colors of the rice.... Packing was also very good. Well done. Hope you maintain this quality in the future also.'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  The  behroz biryani was a true experience to have .The biryani was overloaded with meat chunks and added flavours to it .It offers you desserts too with the biryani as a side dish and also the raiyta had sweet curd  and added flavours to it 
Talking about the  biryani the rice was cooked with flavors and herbs with added  spices and was overall a great blend of what a hyderabadi biryani looks like .
The biryani was packed airtight and was hot before it reached me'), ('Rated 5.0', 'RATED
  Was visiting Bangalore on the weekend and after having a tired day was drooling to have Biryani and stopped by this outlet.
Ordered the Zaikedar paneer Biryani. The rice was perfectly cooked and the spices were balanced. Paneer and rice were so much flavourful with their flavours blended together.
Amazing Biryani experience with refreshing ayran by the side.'), ('Rated 5.0', "RATED
  I was part of the food review programme. This is the murgh biriyani, which they sent with seasoned curd and a gulab jamun.
The biriyani was wonderful, couldn't find a single thing wrong with it. Perfectly seasoned, fragrant. The amount of biriyani can feed an army, it's that much. The gulab jamun was warm and delicious. The seasoned curd went really well with the biriyani.")]
